summary.span: 實作 Berkeley 通訊端介面。

span.span: Implements the Berkeley sockets interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組豐富的方法和屬性進行網路通訊。The class provides a rich set of methods and properties for network communications. 類別可讓您執行同步和非同步資料傳輸使用任何通訊協定中所列列舉型別。The class allows you to perform both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer using any of the communication protocols listed in the enumeration. 類別遵循非同步方法的.NET Framework 命名模式。The class follows the .NET Framework naming pattern for asynchronous methods. 例如，同步方法對應於非同步和方法。For example, the synchronous method corresponds to the asynchronous and methods. 如果您的應用程式只需要一個執行緒在執行期間，使用下列方法，專為同步作業模式。If your application only requires one thread during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for synchronous operation mode. - 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP，您的伺服器可以接聽連線使用方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, your server can listen for connections using the method. 方法會處理任何連入連線要求，並傳回可用來與遠端主機通訊資料。The method processes any incoming connection requests and returns a that you can use to communicate data with the remote host. 使用此傳回來呼叫或方法。Use this returned to call the or method. 呼叫方法之前呼叫方法，如果您想要指定本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。Call the method prior to calling the method if you want to specify the local IP address and port number. 如果您想要指派給您的 可用的連接埠基礎的服務提供者，請使用連接埠號碼為零。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to assign a free port for you. 如果您想要連線到接聽的主機，呼叫方法。If you want to connect to a listening host, call the method. 若要進行通訊的資料，呼叫或方法。To communicate data, call the or method. - 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定，例如 UDP，則您不需要完全接聽連線。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not need to listen for connections at all. 呼叫方法，以接受任何內送的資料包。Call the method to accept any incoming datagrams. 使用資料包傳送至遠端主機的方法。Use the method to send datagrams to a remote host. 若要處理執行期間使用個別執行緒的通訊，請使用下列方法，專為非同步作業模式。To process communications using separate threads during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for asynchronous operation mode. - 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP，使用， ，和方法來連線到接聽的主機。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, use the , , and methods to connect with a listening host. 使用並或是和方法進行非同步通訊資料。Use the and or and methods to communicate data asynchronously. 可以使用處理內送連接要求和。Incoming connection requests can be processed using and . - 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您可以使用並傳送資料包，並和來接收資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you can use and to send datagrams, and and to receive datagrams. 如果您執行多個通訊端上的非同步作業時，沒有一定是在完成會在啟動的順序。If you perform multiple asynchronous operations on a socket, they do not necessarily complete in the order in which they are started. 當您完成傳送和接收資料，請使用方法，以停用。When you are finished sending and receiving data, use the method to disable the . 之後呼叫，呼叫方法來釋放相關聯的所有資源。After calling , call the method to release all resources associated with the . 類別可讓您設定您使用方法。The class allows you to configure your using the method. 擷取使用這些設定方法。Retrieve these settings using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您正在撰寫相當簡單的應用程式，並不需要最大效能，請考慮使用， ，和。If you are writing a relatively simple application and do not require maximum performance, consider using , , and . 這些類別提供更簡單且更方便使用的介面來通訊。These classes provide a simpler and more user-friendly interface to communications. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何類別可用來將資料傳送至 HTTP 伺服器，並接收回應。The following code example shows how the class can be used to send data to an HTTP server and receive the response. 此範例會封鎖直到收到整個頁面。This example blocks until the entire page is received. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CPP/socket.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CS/socket.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/VB/socket.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您呼叫多次使用相同的位元組陣列，為每個呼叫的引數的建構函式，您將建立受管理的多個秒，使用相同的基礎通訊端。If you call the constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed s with the same underlying socket. 這種做法不鼓勵。This practice is strongly discouraged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `socketType`參數指定的型別類別和`protocolType`參數指定所使用的通訊協定。The `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 兩個參數不是獨立的。The two parameters are not independent. 通常類型是隱含的通訊協定。Often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果的組合類型和通訊協定的結果則會在無效的類型，這個建構函式會擲回。If the combination of type and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果這個建構函式會擲回，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `addressFamily`參數指定的位址配置類別使用，`socketType`參數指定的型別類別，而`protocolType`參數指定所使用的通訊協定。The `addressFamily` parameter specifies the addressing scheme that the class uses, the `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class, and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 三個參數不是獨立的。The three parameters are not independent. 有些位址家族限制可以使用哪些通訊協定，與它們，且經常類型是隱含的通訊協定。Some address families restrict which protocols can be used with them, and often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果位址家族的組合類型和類型中無效時，產生的通訊協定，這個建構函式會擲回。If the combination of address family, type, and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果這個建構函式會擲回，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以同步方式暫止連接要求的第一個擷取連線要求的佇列接聽的通訊端，然後建立並傳回新。 synchronously extracts the first pending connection request from the connection request queue of the listening socket, and then creates and returns a new . 您無法使用此傳回接受任何其他的連線，連線佇列中。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 不過，您可以呼叫方法傳回的來識別遠端主機的網路位址和連接埠號碼。However, you can call the method of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. 處於封鎖模式，封鎖，直到連入連線嘗試會排入佇列。In blocking mode, blocks until an incoming connection attempt is queued. 接受連接時，原始繼續佇列的連入連線要求直到您關閉它。Once a connection is accepted, the original continues queuing incoming connection requests until you close it. 如果您呼叫這個方法，使用非封鎖，且要求會排入佇列，沒有連線就會擲回。If you call this method using a non-blocking , and no connection requests are queued, throws a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 然後再呼叫方法中，您必須先呼叫來接聽並連入連線要求排入佇列的方法。Before calling the method, you must first call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例接受簡單連接。The following code example accepts a simple connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用連線導向的通訊協定方法以非同步方式處理連入連線嘗試。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 以非同步方式接受連線，讓您能夠傳送和接收不同的執行緒內的資料。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 然後再呼叫方法，您必須呼叫來接聽並連入連線要求排入佇列的方法。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 若要完成的通知，您必須建立實作事件處理常式的回呼方法\ 委派，並將它以連結事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and hook it to the event. 下列的屬性和事件物件所需：The following properties and events on the object are required: - 呼叫端可以選擇性地指定的現有要用於連入連線，藉由指定搭配使用屬性。The caller can optionally specify an existing to use for the incoming connection by specifying the to use with the property. 如果屬性是 null，新建構具有相同， ，並與目前並將設為屬性。If the property is null, a new is constructed with the same , , and as the current and set as the property. 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. （選擇性） 緩衝區可能會提供用來接收之後在通訊端上的資料的初始區塊方法成功。Optionally, a buffer may be provided in which to receive the initial block of data on the socket after the method succeeds. 在此情況下，屬性必須設定為包含資料的緩衝區，以接收和屬性必須設為接收緩衝區中資料的位元組數目上限。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to receive and the property needs to be set to the maximum number of bytes of data to receive in the buffer. 可以設定這些屬性，使用方法。These properties can be set using the method. 傳入緩衝區的一部分會可供內部使用基礎 Winsock 發生 AcceptEx 呼叫。Part of the buffer passed in will be consumed internally for use by the underlying Winsock AcceptEx call. 這表示傳回的資料量會一律的值小於屬性上的提供執行個體。This means that the amount of data returned will always be less than the value of the property on the instance provided. 在內部使用的緩衝區數量而有所不同的通訊端通訊協定家族。The amount of the buffer used internally varies based on the address family of the socket. 所需的最小緩衝區大小是 288 個位元組。The minimum buffer size required is 288 bytes. 如果指定較大的緩衝區大小，則就會預期收到一些額外的資料以外的 Winsock 發生 AcceptEx 呼叫所收到的資料，並會等候，直到接收到此額外的資料。If a larger buffer size is specified, then the will expect some extra data other than the address data received by the Winsock AcceptEx call and will wait until this extra data is received. 如果發生逾時，會重設連接。If a timeout occurs, the connection is reset. 因此如果特定數量的預期額外的資料，則緩衝區大小應該設為最小緩衝區大小，加上此數量。So if extra data is expected of a specific amount, then the buffer size should be set to the minimum buffer size plus this amount. 完成回呼方法應該檢查屬性來判斷作業是否成功。The completion callback method should examine the property to determine if the operation was successful. 事件可能發生在某些情況下，已接受沒有連線時，導致屬性設為。The event can occur in some cases when no connection has been accepted and cause the property to be set to . 這可能是因為連接埠掃描使用半開啟 SYN 類型掃描 (SYN]-> [同步認可]-> [RST 順序)。This can occur as a result of port scanning using a half-open SYN type scan (a SYN -> SYN-ACK -> RST sequence). 使用應用程式方法應該準備好處理這個狀況。Applications using the method should be prepared to handle this condition.

summary.span: 取得已從網路接收且可供讀取的資料量。

span.span: Gets the amount of data that has been received from the network and is available to be read.

span.span: The number of bytes of data received from the network and available to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用非封鎖，是一個好的方法，以判斷資料是否已排入佇列進行讀取，然後再呼叫。If you are using a non-blocking , is a good way to determine whether data is queued for reading, before calling . 可用的資料是總資料量已排入佇列進行讀取的網路緩衝區中。The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading. 如果沒有資料會排入佇列中的網路緩衝區中，會傳回 0。If no data is queued in the network buffer, returns 0. 如果遠端主機關機或關閉連接，可能會擲回。If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, can throw a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較呼叫 IOControl FIONREAD 與可用屬性的結果。The following code example compares the results of calling IOControl with FIONREAD and the Available property. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketIoControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketIoControl/CPP/iocontrolserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketIoControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketIoControl/CS/iocontrolserver.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用連線導向的通訊協定方法以非同步方式處理連入連線嘗試。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 以非同步方式接受連線，讓您能夠傳送和接收不同的執行緒內的資料。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 然後再呼叫方法，您必須呼叫來接聽並連入連線要求排入佇列的方法。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 您必須建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 若要這樣做，請在非常小，您必須傳遞接聽物件至透過`state`參數。To do this, at the very minimum, you must pass the listening object to through the `state` parameter. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立小型類別以包裝和其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法應該叫用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統通常會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並封鎖上之前擷取暫止的連接。When your application calls , the system usually uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method and blocks on until a pending connection is retrieved. 會傳回新物件，您可以用來傳送和接收資料，與遠端主機。 will return a new object that you can use to send and receive data with the remote host. 您無法使用此傳回接受任何其他的連線，連線佇列中。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 如果您想封鎖之後呼叫的原始執行緒方法，請使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 在上呼叫 Set 方法在回呼方法，當您想要繼續執行的原始執行緒時。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 系統可能也會使用呼叫執行緒叫用回呼方法。The system may also use the calling thread to invoke the callback method. 在此情況下，對傳回的屬性將會設定為表示方法以同步方式完成。In this case, the property on the returned will be set to indicate that the method completed synchronously. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 若要取消擱置中的呼叫方法，關閉。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 當非同步作業正在進行時，會呼叫方法，來提供回呼呼叫方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 後續呼叫方法會擲回來指出已取消作業。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用屬性傳回之來識別遠端主機的網路位址和連接埠號碼。You can use the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱[Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2)錯誤的詳細描述的文件。After you have obtained this code, refer to the [Windows Sockets version 2 API error code](/windows/desktop/winsock/windows-sockets-error-codes-2) documentation for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會嘗試以非同步方式接收連入連線。The following code example attempts to receive an incoming connection asynchronously. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#2)]

如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟通訊端，並接受非同步連線。The following code example opens a socket and accepts an asynchronous connection. 在此範例中，通訊端接受初始的 10 個位元組的資料並`acceptSocket`參數是`null`，可以強制方法用來建立接受通訊端。In this example, the socket accepts the initial 10 bytes of data and the `acceptSocket` parameter is `null`, which forces the method to create the accepted socket. 接收的位元組數目和資料會顯示在主控台上的回呼委派。The number of bytes received and the data are displayed on the console by the callback delegate. 請參閱的收到的剩餘資料的方式說明。See for a description of how the remaining data is received. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，方法會啟動連線到的非同步要求`remoteEP`參數。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the `remoteEP` parameter. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，建立預設遠端主機。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 連接或以非同步方式設定預設遠端主機可讓您能夠傳送和接收不同的執行緒內的資料。Connecting or setting the default remote host asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 您可以建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 至少，您必須傳遞要透過`state`參數。At the very minimum, you must pass the to through the `state` parameter. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立小型類別以包裝，以及其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法應該叫用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖直到成功連線，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the connects successfully or throws an exception. 如果您想封鎖之後呼叫的原始執行緒方法，請使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 在上呼叫 Set 方法在回呼方法，當您想要繼續執行的原始執行緒時。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您就不必呼叫之前傳送和接收資料。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 您可以使用和與遠端主機通訊。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果您呼叫，將會捨棄任何資料包來自指定的預設值以外的位址。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫且設定為廣播`true`。If you wish to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果您不能將會擲回。If you cannot, will throw a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並不會呼叫再呼叫，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的區域網路位址和連接埠號碼。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者將未指派本機網路位址和連接埠號碼直到您呼叫或方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you call the or method. 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫方法一次所需的端點。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 若要取消擱置中的呼叫方法，關閉。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 當非同步作業正在進行時，會呼叫方法，來提供回呼呼叫方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 後續呼叫方法會擲回來指出已取消作業。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個通訊端先前已中斷連線，然後必須在作業完成之前，不會結束的執行緒上呼叫。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 這是基礎提供者的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會起始非同步連接嘗試。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection attempt. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#1)]

(特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`requestCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消擱置中的呼叫方法，關閉。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 當非同步作業正在進行時，會呼叫方法，來提供回呼呼叫方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 後續呼叫方法會擲回來指出已取消作業。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果這個通訊端先前已中斷連線，然後必須在作業完成之前，不會結束的執行緒上呼叫。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 這是基礎提供者的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. 也也就是使用必須不同。Also the that is used must be different. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會起始非同步連接嘗試。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection attempt. summary.span: 開始非同步要求，以中斷遠端端點的連接。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous request to disconnect from a remote endpoint.

returns.span: 物件，參考非同步作業。

span.span: An object that references the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您可以呼叫方法來要求從遠端端點的中斷連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can call the method to request a disconnect from a remote endpoint. 如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，您可以重複使用通訊端。If `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket. 方法會使用個別的執行緒叫用指定的回呼方法。The method uses a separate thread to invoke the specified callback method. 方法會封鎖直到暫止中斷連線已完成。The method blocks until the pending disconnect is complete. 如需有關如何撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到例外狀況，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立非同步通訊的通訊端，並將部分資料傳送至遠端主機。The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 當資料已傳送時，稱為停止傳送及接收活動。When the data has been sent, is called to stop the send and receive activity. 然後呼叫以開始中斷連接要求。Then is called to begin a disconnect request. 要求完成時，屬性查詢來測試是否已中斷連線的通訊端。When the request completes, the property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected. [!code-cpp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#11)]

library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 該執行緒結束時，會取消指定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。A pending remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`callback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用其中一種方法多載。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消暫止，呼叫方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 該執行緒結束時，會取消指定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開始以非同步方式接收來自已連接的 資料。The following code example begins to asynchronously receive data from a connected . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您開始以非同步方式讀取從遠端主機的 無連接的資料包。The method starts asynchronously reading connectionless datagrams from a remote host. 呼叫方法可讓您能夠接收不同的執行緒內的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread. 您可以建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設正在使用的通訊。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立小型類別以包裝和其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法應該叫用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，它就會封鎖直到讀取資料，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and it will block on until the reads data or throws an exception. 如果您想封鎖之後呼叫的原始執行緒方法，請使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 當您想要繼續執行原始執行緒時，呼叫 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法中的 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關如何撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 然後再呼叫，您必須明確地繫結本機端點，使用方法，或將會擲回。Before calling , you must explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method, or will throw a . 這個方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，而擷取的遠端主機傳送資料的端點。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent. 如需如何擷取此端點的資訊，請參閱。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 這個方法是最有用，如果您想要以非同步方式接收來自未知的主機或多部主機的 無連接的資料包。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. 在這些情況下，會讀取到區域網路緩衝區收到第一個加入佇列的資料包。In these cases, will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer. 如果您收到的資料包大於的大小`buffer`，則方法將會填滿`buffer`盡可能是盡可能，，並擲回的訊息與。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a . 如果您使用的不可靠的通訊協定，超過的資料將會遺失。If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost. 如果您使用可靠的通訊協定、 過多的資料會保留由服務提供者，而且您可以呼叫來擷取夠大的緩衝區的方法。If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the method with a large enough buffer. 若要保證，一律會傳回遠端主機的端點，應用程式應該明確繫結本機端點，使用方法，然後呼叫方法`optionLevel`參數設定為或適時`optionName`參數設定為，而`optionValue`參數來啟用此選項，然後再呼叫方法。To guarantee that the remote host endpoint is always returned, an application should explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method and then call the method with the `optionLevel` parameter set to or as appropriate, the `optionName` parameter set to , and the `optionValue` parameter to enable this option before calling the method. 否則，可能會遠端主機的端點，並不會傳回當接收者已呼叫之前，傳送者已傳送的資料包數目方法。Otherwise, it is possible for the remote host endpoint to not be returned when the sender has sent a number of datagrams before the receiver has called the method. 雖然適用於無連線的通訊協定，您可以使用連線導向的通訊協定以及。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果您選擇這樣做，您必須先請建立遠端主機連接藉由呼叫 / 方法，或藉由呼叫接受連入連線要求或方法。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the / method or accept an incoming connection request by calling the or method. 如果您呼叫方法建立，或接受連線之前，您就有。If you call the method before establishing or accepting a connection, you will get a . 您也可以建立預設遠端主機的無連線的通訊協定，才能呼叫方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在這些情況下，任一方法將會忽略`remoteEP`參數和只接收來自已連接的資料或預設遠端主機。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 使用連線導向的通訊端會讀取位於不超過所指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 若要取消暫止，呼叫方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例以非同步方式接收來自遠端主機的無連接的資料包。The following code example asynchronously receives connectionless datagrams from a remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步接收作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous receive operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`asyncCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 若要取消暫止，呼叫方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 這個方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，和擷取的遠端主機資料會傳送的端點，以及收到的封包的相關資訊。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent, as well as information about the received packet. 如需如何擷取此端點的資訊，請參閱。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 這個方法是最有用，如果您想要以非同步方式接收來自未知的主機或多部主機的 無連接的資料包。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中所建立的遠端主機， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or method. 如果您未先呼叫將會擲回例外狀況， ， ，或。 will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 呼叫方法可讓您能夠傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 您可以建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設正在使用的通訊。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立的小型類別或結構以容納和其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法應該叫用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果您想封鎖之後呼叫的原始執行緒方法，請使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 當您想要繼續執行原始執行緒時，呼叫 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法中的 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 適用於連線導向的通訊協定，雖然也適用於無連線的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫或方法，以建立預設遠端主機。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送至數個不同的主控件，您應該使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 可以使用即使您已建立預設遠端主機與之後。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，才能呼叫藉由再次呼叫或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 您也必須確定您的緩衝區的大小未超過最大的封包大小為基礎的服務提供者無連接的通訊協定。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 該執行緒結束時，會取消指定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中所建立的遠端主機， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or method. 如果您未先呼叫將會擲回例外狀況， ， ，或。 will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 呼叫方法可讓您能夠傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 您可以建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設正在使用的通訊。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立的小型類別或結構以容納和其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法應該叫用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果您想封鎖之後呼叫的原始執行緒方法，請使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 當您想要繼續執行原始執行緒時，呼叫 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法中的 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 適用於連線導向的通訊協定，雖然也適用於無連線的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫或方法，以建立預設遠端主機。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送至數個不同的主控件，您應該使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 可以使用即使您已建立預設遠端主機與之後。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，才能呼叫藉由再次呼叫或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 您也必須確定您的緩衝區的大小未超過最大的封包大小為基礎的服務提供者無連接的通訊協定。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 該執行緒結束時，會取消指定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是使用者定義的具現化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會將該檔案傳送`fileName`要連接的通訊端。This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket. 如果`fileName`是在本機目錄中，它可能會用來識別檔案的名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案的名稱。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 萬用字元 ("...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共用名稱 ("\\\\\\\shared 目錄\\\myfile.txt 」) 支援。Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果檔案找不到，例外狀況就會擲回。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. 這個方法會使用`TransmitFile`函式位於 Windows Sockets 2 API。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 如需詳細資訊`TransmitFile`函式和它的旗標，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows 通訊端文件。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中所建立的遠端主機，， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the ,, , or methods. 如果您未先呼叫，會擲回例外狀況， ， ，或。 throws an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 呼叫方法可讓您傳送不同的執行緒中的檔案。Calling the method enables you to send a file within a separate execution thread. 若要完成此作業，您可以建立會叫用的回呼方法委派參數。To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate parameter. 若要這樣做，在非常小`state`參數必須包含物件正在使用的通訊。To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the object being used for communication. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立類別或結構來保存和其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 傳遞至這個自訂物件的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this custom object to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法必須叫用方法。Your callback method must invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並封鎖直到會傳送整個檔案，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the entire file or throws an exception. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 適用於連線導向的通訊協定，雖然也適用於無連線的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫或方法，以建立預設遠端主機。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 無連接的通訊協定，您必須確定檔案的大小未超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，不會傳送資料包並會擲回例外狀況。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到例外狀況，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並連接通訊端的非同步通訊。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication. 首先，到遠端主機時以非同步方式傳送檔案"text.txt 」。First, the file "text.txt" is sent asynchronously to the remote host. 回呼委派呼叫完成傳輸。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載都需要您想要傳送的檔案和的位元組合名稱值。This overload requires the name of the file you want to send and a bitwise combination of values. `preBuffer`參數包含您想要在檔案的所有資料。The `preBuffer` parameter contains any data you want to precede the file. `postBuffer` 包含您想要按照檔案中的資料。`postBuffer` contains data you want to follow the file. 如果`fileName`是在本機目錄中，它可能會用來識別檔案的名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案的名稱。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 萬用字元 ("...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共用名稱 ("\\\\\\\shared 目錄\\\myfile.txt 」) 支援。Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果檔案找不到，例外狀況就會擲回。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. `flags`參數提供的視窗通訊端服務提供者的檔案傳輸的其他資訊。The `flags` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the file transfer. 如需如何使用此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 這個方法會使用`TransmitFile`函式位於 Windows Sockets 2 API。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 如需詳細資訊`TransmitFile`函式和它的旗標，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows 通訊端文件。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中所建立的遠端主機， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or methods. 如果您未先呼叫，會擲回例外狀況， ， ，或。 throws an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 呼叫方法可讓您能夠傳送不同的執行緒中的檔案。Calling the method gives you the ability to send a file within a separate execution thread. 若要完成此作業，您可以建立會叫用的回呼方法委派參數。To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate parameter. 若要這樣做，在非常小`state`參數必須包含物件正在使用的通訊。To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the object being used for communication. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立類別或結構來保存和其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 傳遞至這個自訂物件的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this custom object to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法必須叫用方法。Your callback method must invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並封鎖直到會傳送整個檔案，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the entire file or throws an exception. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 適用於連線導向的通訊協定，雖然也適用於無連線的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫或方法，以建立預設遠端主機。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 您也必須確定檔案的大小未超過最大的封包大小為基礎的服務提供者無連接的通訊協定。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，不會傳送資料包並會擲回例外狀況。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到例外狀況，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 執行內容 （的安全性內容中，模擬的使用者和呼叫的內容） 快取以供非同步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定內容的第一次使用後 (特定非同步方法中，特定執行個體與指定的回撥)，該內容的後續使用將會看見效能改進。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和連接的非同步通訊的通訊端並開始以非同步方式遠端主機傳送檔案"text.txt 」。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication and begins sending the file "text.txt" asynchronously to the remote host. 在此範例中，`preBuffer`並`postBuffer`的資料建立用來傳送檔案與預設會使用值。In this example, a `preBuffer` and a `postBuffer` of data is created to send with the file and the default value is used. 回呼委派呼叫完成傳輸。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. [!code-cpp[NCLSocketEnhancements#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NCLSocketEnhancements#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中指定遠端主機`remoteEP`參數。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the `remoteEP` parameter. 呼叫方法可讓您能夠傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 適用於無連線的通訊協定，雖然無連線和連線導向的通訊協定的運作方式。Although intended for connectionless protocols, works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 您可以建立回呼方法可實作委派，並將其名稱來傳遞方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 若要這樣做，在非常小，您`state`參數必須包含已連接，或預設正在使用的通訊。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果回呼需要更多的資訊時，您可以建立小型類別以包裝，以及其他必要的資訊。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 傳遞至這個類別的執行個體方法，透過`state`參數。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 您的回呼方法應該叫用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 當您的應用程式呼叫，系統會使用個別的執行緒來執行指定的回呼方法，並會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目，或擲回例外狀況。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果您想封鎖之後呼叫的原始執行緒方法，請使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 當您想要繼續執行原始執行緒時，呼叫 T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent 在回呼方法中的 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 如需有關撰寫回呼方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[封送處理為回呼方法的委派](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information about writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須先呼叫， ， ，或方法，或將會擲回。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the , , , or method, or will throw a . 將會忽略`remoteEP`參數並傳送資料到中建立， ， ，或方法。 will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and send data to the established in the , , , or method. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不需要建立的預設遠端主機或是方法之前呼叫。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the or method prior to calling . 您只需要這樣做，如果您想要呼叫方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果您呼叫或方法之前呼叫，則`remoteEP`參數會覆寫指定的預設遠端主機，可傳送作業才。If you do call the or method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 您也不需要呼叫方法。You are also not required to call the method. 在此情況下，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的區域網路位址和連接埠號碼。In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您想要選取可用的連接埠基礎的服務提供者，請使用連接埠號碼為零。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果您需要識別指派的本機網路位址和連接埠號碼，您可以使用屬性之後方法成功完成。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 如果您想要將資料傳送至的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫方法，並設定通訊端選項設定為。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . -您也必須確定您的緩衝區的大小未超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包大小。-You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，如果您需要使用特定的本機端點。Use the method if you need to use a specific local endpoint. 您必須呼叫您可以呼叫之前方法。You must call before you can call the method. 您不需要呼叫才能使用方法除非您需要使用特定的本機端點。You do not need to call before using the method unless you need to use a specific local endpoint. 您可以使用無連線和連線導向的通訊協定上的方法。You can use the method on both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 然後再呼叫，您必須先建立本機從您要通訊的資料。Before calling , you must first create the local from which you intend to communicate data. 如果您並不在意指派的本機位址，您可以建立使用位址參數，以及基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的網路位址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 這有助於簡化您的應用程式，如果您有多個網路介面。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠，您可以建立使用 0 連接埠號碼。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在此情況下，服務提供者會指派可用的通訊埠編號介於 1024年到 5000 之間。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果您使用上述的方法，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和連接埠號碼已被指派藉由呼叫。If you use the above approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by calling the . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，之後所做的呼叫，則不會傳回在本機指派的網路位址，直到或方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will not return the locally assigned network address until after you have made a call to the or method. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不會存取此資訊之前便已完成傳送或接收。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you will not have access to this information until you have completed a send or receive. 如果想要接收已接收的封包的介面資訊的 UDP 通訊端通訊端選項設為應該明確地呼叫方法後立即呼叫方法。If a UDP socket wants to receive interface information on received packets, the method should be explicitly called with the socket option set to immediately after calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要接收多點傳送的資料包，您必須呼叫方法的多點傳送連接埠號碼。If you intend to receive multicast datagrams, you must call the method with a multicast port number. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫方法，如果您想要接收無連接的資料包使用方法。You must call the method if you intend to receive connectionless datagrams using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到呼叫時方法，請使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a when calling the method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例繫結使用指定的本機端點。The following code example binds a using the specified local endpoint. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否處於封鎖模式。The property indicates whether a is in blocking mode. 如果您處於封鎖模式中，而且您在進行方法呼叫的未立即完成，您的應用程式會封鎖執行，直到完成要求的作業。If you are in blocking mode, and you make a method call which does not complete immediately, your application will block execution until the requested operation completes. 如果您想要繼續，即使未完成要求的作業、 變更執行屬性設`false`。If you want execution to continue even though the requested operation is not complete, change the property to `false`. 屬性沒有任何作用，非同步方法。The property has no effect on asynchronous methods. 如果您是傳送和接收資料，以非同步方式想要封鎖執行，使用類別。If you are sending and receiving data asynchronously and want to block execution, use the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: Closes the connection and releases all associated resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會關閉連接遠端主機和版本的所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源相關聯。The method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 時結語屬性設定為`false`。Upon closing, the property is set to `false`. 連線導向的通訊協定，建議您呼叫再呼叫方法。For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call before calling the method. 這可確保所有資料都傳送及它在關閉之前，連接的通訊端上接收。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 如果您需要呼叫情況下先呼叫，您可以確定資料中，會傳送所設定的連出傳輸佇列選項設定為`false`並指定非零逾時間隔。If you need to call without first calling , you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval. 就會封鎖直到這項資料會傳送，或直到指定的逾時過期為止。 will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果您設定要`false`並指定為零的逾時間隔，釋出連線，並會自動捨棄 外寄佇列的資料。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 若要設定通訊端選項來`false`，建立，將啟用的屬性設定為`true`，並設定屬性所需的逾時期間。To set the socket option to `false`, create a , set the enabled property to `true`, and set the property to the desired time out period. 使用此連同通訊端選項來呼叫方法。Use this along with the socket option to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會關閉。The following code example closes a . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立與遠端主機的連線。

span.span: Establishes a connection to a remote host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，例如 TCP方法以同步方式建立之間的網路連線和指定的遠端端點。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the method synchronously establishes a network connection between and the specified remote endpoint. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，建立預設遠端主機。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 在您呼叫後，您可以將資料傳送到遠端裝置與方法，或從遠端裝置與接收資料方法。After you call , you can send data to the remote device with the method, or receive data from the remote device with the method. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您就不必呼叫之前傳送和接收資料。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 您可以使用和進行同步通訊與遠端主機。You can use and to synchronously communicate with a remote host. 如果您呼叫，將會捨棄任何資料包來自指定的預設值以外的位址。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫方法，並設定通訊端選項設定為，或將會擲回。If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to , or will throw a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 方法將會封鎖，除非您特別設定屬性設`false`才能呼叫。The method will block, unless you specifically set the property to `false` prior to calling . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定時，例如 TCP 和您不要停用封鎖將會擲回因為它需要時間來進行連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, will throw a because it needs time to make the connection. 因為它們只是建立預設遠端主機，無連線通訊協定不會擲回例外狀況。Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host. 您可以使用來取得特定的錯誤碼。You can use to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 傳回的錯誤，連接遠端主機已起始連線導向，但尚未完成成功。If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented , but has not yet completed successfully. 使用方法，以判斷何時完成連接。Use the method to determine when the is finished connecting. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，才會呼叫再呼叫，基礎的服務提供者會將指派的本機網路位址和連接埠編號。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者將未指派本機網路位址和連接埠號碼直到您完成傳送或接收作業。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation. 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫再次使用所需的端點。If you want to change the default remote host, call again with the desired endpoint. > [!NOTE] > 如果通訊端具有先前中斷連接，然後您就無法使用此方法以還原連線。If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection. 使用其中一種非同步重新連線的方法。Use one of the asynchronous methods to reconnect. 這是基礎提供者的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會連線到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

not have to call before sending and receiving data. 您可以使用和進行同步通訊與遠端主機。You can use and to synchronously communicate with a remote host. 如果您呼叫任何資料包來自指定的預設值以外的位址將會被捨棄。If you do call any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫方法，並設定通訊端選項設定為，或將會擲回。If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to , or will throw a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 方法會封鎖，除非您特別設定，否則屬性，以`false`才能呼叫。 method will block, unless you specifically set the property to `false` prior to calling . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定時，例如 TCP 和您不要停用封鎖將會擲回因為它需要時間來進行連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, will throw a because it needs time to make the connection. 因為它們只是建立預設遠端主機，無連線通訊協定不會擲回例外狀況。Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host. 您可以使用來取得特定的錯誤碼。You can use to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 傳回的錯誤，連接遠端主機已起始連線導向，但尚未完成成功。If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented , but has not yet completed successfully. 使用方法，以判斷何時完成連接。Use the method to determine when the is finished connecting. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，才會呼叫再呼叫，基礎的服務提供者會將指派的本機網路位址和連接埠編號。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者將未指派本機網路位址和連接埠號碼直到您完成傳送或接收作業。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation. 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫再次使用所需的端點。If you want to change the default remote host, call again with the desired endpoint. > [!NOTE] > 如果通訊端具有先前中斷連接，然後您就無法使用此方法以還原連線。If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection. 使用其中一種非同步重新連線的方法。Use one of the asynchronous methods to reconnect. 這是基礎提供者的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會連線到遠端端點，然後驗證該連接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection.
