remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，方法會啟動遠端主機連接的非同步要求。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the remote host. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，建立預設遠端主機。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 若要完成的通知，您必須建立實作事件處理常式的回呼方法\ 委派，並將附加的回呼事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 呼叫端必須將屬性設連線至遠端主機。The caller must set the property to the of the remote host to connect to. 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定，例如 UDP，您就不必呼叫之前傳送和接收資料。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 您可以使用和與遠端主機通訊。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果您呼叫，將會捨棄任何資料包來自指定的預設值以外的位址。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果您想要變更預設遠端主機時，呼叫方法一次所需的端點。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 如果您想要設定預設遠端主機的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫且設定為廣播`true`。If you wish to set the default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果不這麼做，方法會擲回。If this is not done, the method will throw a . 下列的屬性和事件物件所需：The following properties and events on the object are required: - - （選擇性） 緩衝區可能會提供這將會以不可分割方式傳送之後在通訊端上方法成功。Optionally, a buffer may be provided which will atomically be sent on the socket after the method succeeds. 在此情況下，屬性必須設定為包含資料的緩衝區，以傳送和屬性必須設定為從緩衝區傳送資料的位元組數目。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to send and the property needs to be set to the number of bytes of data to send from the buffer. 一旦建立連線時，就會傳送此緩衝區的資料。Once a connection is established, this buffer of data is sent. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定並不會呼叫再呼叫，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的區域網路位址和連接埠號碼。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，服務提供者將未指派區域網路 IP 位址和連接埠號碼直到您呼叫或方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network IP address and port number until you call the or methods. 方法會擲回如果 family而不相同的位址系列。The method throws if the address family of the and the are not the same address family. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到呼叫這個方法時，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a when calling this method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.

span.span: if the was connected to a remote resource as of the most recent operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Connected`屬性取得的連接狀態截至最後一個 I/O 作業。The `Connected` property gets the connection state of the as of the last I/O operation. 當它傳回`false`，則永遠不會連接，或已中斷連線。When it returns `false`, the was either never connected, or is no longer connected. 值屬性會反映最新的作業連接的狀態。The value of the property reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation. 如果您需要判斷目前的連接狀態，請呼叫非封鎖，零位元組傳送。If you need to determine the current state of the connection, make a nonblocking, zero-byte Send call. 如果呼叫成功傳回，或擲回 WAEWOULDBLOCK 錯誤程式碼 (10035)，然後連接通訊端仍;否則，通訊端已中斷連線。If the call returns successfully or throws a WAEWOULDBLOCK error code (10035), then the socket is still connected; otherwise, the socket is no longer connected. 如果您呼叫使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP) 通訊端上屬性一律會傳回`true`; 不過，此動作不會變更 UDP 原本就不需連線性質。If you call on a User Datagram Protocol (UDP) socket, the property always returns `true`; however, this action does not change the inherent connectionless nature of UDP. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會連線到遠端端點，檢查屬性，並檢查連線的目前狀態。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint, checks the property, and checks the current state of the connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Connect Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Connect Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 關閉通訊端連線並允許重複使用通訊端。

span.span: Closes the socket connection and allows reuse of the socket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您可以使用這個方法，以關閉通訊端。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can use this method to close the socket. 此方法結束的連接和集合屬性設`false`。This method ends the connection and sets the property to `false`. 不過，如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，您可以重複使用通訊端。However, if `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket. 若要確保所有資料都傳送及接收通訊端關閉之前，您應該呼叫再呼叫方法。To ensure that all data is sent and received before the socket is closed, you should call before calling the method. 如果您需要呼叫情況下先呼叫，您可以設定選項設定為`false`並指定非零的逾時間隔，以確保資料在傳送 傳出傳輸排入佇列。If you need to call without first calling , you can set the option to `false` and specify a nonzero time-out interval to ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission is sent. 然後會封鎖直到將資料傳送，或直到指定的逾時過期為止。 then blocks until the data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果您設定要`false`並指定為零的逾時間隔，釋出連線，並會自動捨棄 外寄佇列的資料。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立同步通訊的通訊端，並將部分資料傳送至遠端主機。The following code example creates a socket for synchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 然後它會呼叫，以停止傳送及接收活動，以及以關閉通訊端連線。It then calls , to stop the send and receive activity, and , to close the socket connection. [!code-cpp[Nclsocketenhancements#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[Nclsocketenhancements#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#12)]

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指定 是否允許將網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 資料包分散。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the allows Internet Protocol (IP) datagrams to be fragmented.

value.span: 如果 允許資料包分散，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the allows datagram fragmentation; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料包需要分散，當其大小超過最大傳輸單位 (MTU) 的傳輸媒介。Datagrams require fragmentation when their size exceeds the Maximum Transfer Unit (MTU) of the transmission medium. 可能分散資料包，藉由傳送主機 （所有的網際網路通訊協定版本） 或中繼路由器 (Internet Protocol Version 4 僅)。Datagrams may be fragmented by the sending host (all Internet Protocol versions) or an intermediate router (Internet Protocol Version 4 only). 如果必須分割資料包 (datagram)，而選項設定，會捨棄的資料包，網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 錯誤訊息傳回給寄件者的資料包。If a datagram must be fragmented, and the option is set, the datagram is discarded, and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) error message is sent back to the sender of the datagram. 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. Attribute.AttributeName: System.MonoLimitation("We do not support passing sockets across processes, we merely allow this API to pass the socket across AppDomains")

param.name: targetProcessId
param.span: 建立重複通訊端參考的目標處理序 ID。

span.span: The ID of the target process where a duplicate of the socket reference is created.

summary.span: 複製目標處理序的通訊端參考，並關閉這個處理序的通訊端。

span.span: Duplicates the socket reference for the target process, and closes the socket for this process.

returns.span: 要傳遞至目標處理序的通訊端參考。

span.span: The socket reference to be passed to the target process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目標處理序應該使用建立重複通訊端執行個體。The target process should use to create the duplicate socket instance. 如果您呼叫多次使用相同的位元組陣列，為每個呼叫的引數的建構函式，您將建立受管理的多個具有相同的基礎通訊端的執行個體。If you call the constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed instances with the same underlying socket. 這種做法不鼓勵。This practice is strongly discouraged. 如果建立通訊端處理程序會使用非同步方法 (或)，必須先設定程序屬性設為 true，否則繫結至建立的程序，這可能會造成的完成連接埠的通訊端目標處理序上被擲回。If the process creating the socket uses asynchronous methods ( or ), the process must first set the property to true; otherwise, the socket is bound to the completion port of the creating process, which may cause an to be thrown on the target process.

exception.span: 不是有效的處理序 ID。

span.span: is not a valid process id.
-or-
Duplication of the socket reference failed.

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指定 是否可以傳送或接收廣播封包。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the can send or receive broadcast packets.

value.span: 如果 允許廣播封包，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the allows broadcast packets; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 廣播限制為特定的子網路，而且必須使用使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP)。針對網際網路通訊協定第 4 版，您可以廣播到本機子網路的封包傳送至 255.255.255.255;或者，您可以使用導向的廣播的位址，也就是使用中的主機部分設定的所有位元的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址的網路部分。Broadcasting is limited to a specific subnet, and must use User Datagram Protocol (UDP.) For Internet Protocol version 4, you can broadcast to your local subnet by sending a packet to 255.255.255.255; or you can use the directed broadcast address, which is the network portion of an Internet Protocol (IP) address with all bits set in the host portion. 例如，如果您的 IP 位址為 192.168.1.40 （類別 C 位址，與網路遮罩 255.255.255.0-網路部分是前三個八位元，而的主機部分是最後一個八位元），則導向的廣播的位址為 192.168.1.255。For example, if your IP address is 192.168.1.40 (a Class C address, with a netmask of 255.255.255.0 -- the network portion is the first three octets, and the host portion is the last octet), your directed broadcast address is 192.168.1.255. 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成呼叫。 completes a call to . 然後再呼叫，您必須建立會叫用的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate. 此回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行和之後系統便會呼叫方法會傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the method returns. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法`asyncResult`參數來取得上它正在嘗試連線。Within the callback method, call the method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成連線嘗試。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. `buffer`的這個多載的參數包含收到的呼叫中的資料而`bytesTransferred`參數會包含已在呼叫中傳送的位元組數目。The `buffer` parameter of this overload contains the data that was received in the call to and the `bytesTransferred` parameter contains the number of bytes that were transferred in the call. 方法會封鎖直到暫止的連接，就連入連線佇列中。The method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue. 方法會接受連入連線，並傳回新，可用來傳送和接收來自遠端主機的資料。The method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來建立並連接通訊端，並接受初始的 10 個位元組的資料。The following code example uses to create and connect a socket and accept the initial 10 bytes of data. 回呼委派呼叫結束非同步要求。The callback delegate calls to end the asynchronous request. 已傳送的位元組數目和資料會傳回`buffer`和`bytesTransferred`參數，這個方法會顯示在主控台上。The number of bytes transmitted and the data are returned in the `buffer` and `bytesTransferred` parameters of this method and are displayed on the console. Examples 下列程式碼範例會結束的非同步要求，並建立新接受連入連線要求。The following code example ends an asynchronous request and creates a new to accept an incoming connection request. 如需示範如何使用通訊端的非同步通訊的完整範例，請參閱 < [ 通訊端程式碼範例](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md)。For a complete example that demonstrates asynchronous communications with sockets, see [Socket Code Examples](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成呼叫。 completes a call to . 然後再呼叫，您必須建立會叫用的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate. 此回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行和之後系統便會呼叫方法會傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the method returns. 它必須接受`asyncResult`參數傳回方法。It must accept the `asyncResult` parameter returned from the method. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法`asyncResult`參數來取得上它正在嘗試連線。Within the callback method, call the method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成連線嘗試。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. `buffer`的這個多載的參數包含收到的呼叫中的資料而`bytesTransferred`參數會包含已在呼叫中傳送的位元組數目。The `buffer` parameter of this overload contains the data that was received in the call to and the `bytesTransferred` parameter contains the number of bytes that were transferred in the call. 方法會封鎖直到暫止的連接，就連入連線佇列中。The method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue. 方法會接受連入連線，並傳回新，可用來傳送和接收來自遠端主機的資料。The method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來建立並連接通訊端，並接受初始的 10 個位元組的資料。The following code example uses to create and connect a socket and accept the initial 10 bytes of data. 回呼委派呼叫結束非同步要求。The callback delegate calls to end the asynchronous request. 已傳送的位元組數目和資料會傳回`buffer`和`bytesTransferred`參數，這個方法會顯示在主控台上。The number of bytes transmitted and the data are returned in the `buffer` and `bytesTransferred` parameters of this method and are displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成非同步的遠端主機連線要求的封鎖方法以啟動方法。 is a blocking method that completes the asynchronous remote host connection request started in the method. 然後再呼叫，您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行之後, 系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受所傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned by the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法參數來取得上它正在嘗試連線。Within the callback method, call the method of the parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成連線嘗試。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會結束非同步的連線嘗試。The following code example ends the asynchronous connection attempt. 如需示範如何使用通訊端的非同步通訊的完整範例，請參閱 < [ 通訊端程式碼範例](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md)。For a complete example that demonstrates asynchronous communications with sockets, see [Socket Code Examples](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成呼叫。 completes a call to . 方法會封鎖直到完成中斷連線為止。The method blocks until the disconnect completes. 如需非同步作業的資訊，請參閱 MSDN library 中的非同步程式設計的概觀主題。For information about asynchronous operations, see the Asynchronous Programming Overview topic in the MSDN library. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立非同步通訊的通訊端，並將部分資料傳送至遠端主機。The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 當資料已傳送時，稱為停止傳送及接收活動。When the data has been sent, is called to stop the send and receive activity. 然後呼叫以開始中斷連接要求。Then is called to begin a disconnect request. 回呼委派呼叫結束非同步要求。The callback delegate calls to end the asynchronous request. 要求完成時，屬性查詢來測試是否已中斷連線的通訊端。When the request completes, the property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected. [!code-cpp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成非同步的讀取的作業，以啟動方法。The method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the method. 然後再呼叫，您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行之後, 系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受所傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned by the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法取得狀態物件傳遞至方法。Within the callback method, call the method of the to obtain the state object passed to the method. 擷取接收從這個狀態物件。Extract the receiving from this state object. 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成讀取的作業，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read. 方法將會封鎖直到資料可供使用。The method will block until data is available. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，會讀取連入的網路緩衝區中有可用的第一個加入佇列的資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol, will read the first enqueued datagram available in the incoming network buffer. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，方法會讀取位於不超過您指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes you specified in the `size` parameter of the method. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. 若要取得已接收的資料，請呼叫方法的，並將解壓縮所產生的狀態物件中所含的緩衝區。To obtain the received data, call the method of the , and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object. 若要取消暫止，呼叫方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 該執行緒結束時，會取消指定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會結束暫止的非同步讀取。The following code example ends a pending asynchronous read. 如需示範如何使用通訊端的非同步通訊的完整範例，請參閱 < [ 通訊端程式碼範例](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md)。For a complete example that demonstrates asynchronous communications with sockets, see [Socket Code Examples](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成非同步的讀取的作業，以啟動方法。The method completes the asynchronous read operation started in the method. 然後再呼叫，您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行之後, 系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受所傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned by the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法取得狀態物件傳遞至方法。Within the callback method, call the method of the to obtain the state object passed to the method. 擷取接收從這個狀態物件。Extract the receiving from this state object. 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成讀取的作業，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the read operation and return the number of bytes read. 方法將會封鎖直到資料可供使用。The method will block until data is available. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，會讀取連入的網路緩衝區中有可用的第一個加入佇列的資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol, will read the first enqueued datagram available in the incoming network buffer. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，方法會讀取位於不超過您指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes you specified in the `size` parameter of the method. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. 若要取得已接收的資料，請呼叫方法的物件，並將解壓縮所產生的狀態物件中所含的緩衝區。To obtain the received data, call the method of the object, and extract the buffer contained in the resulting state object. 若要識別原始的主機，擷取將它轉換成。To identify the originating host, extract the and cast it to an . 使用方法，以取得 IP 位址和方法，以取得連接埠號碼。Use the method to obtain the IP address and the method to obtain the port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會結束暫止的非同步讀取從特定。The following code example ends a pending asynchronous read from a specific . remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成非同步傳送作業中啟動。 completes the asynchronous send operation started in . 然後再呼叫，您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行之後, 系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受所傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned by the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法參數，以取得傳送。Within the callback method, call the method of the parameter to obtain the sending . 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成傳送作業，並傳回傳送的位元組數目。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到傳送資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol, will block until the datagram is sent. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到某些緩衝區已傳送。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until some of the buffer was sent. 如果傳回的值從表示緩衝區未完全傳送時，呼叫方法同樣地，修改保留未傳送的資料緩衝區。If the return value from indicates that the buffer was not completely sent, call the method again, modifying the buffer to hold the unsent data. 則您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路無法保證。There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 該執行緒結束時，會取消指定的執行緒所起始的所有 I/O。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果執行緒結束的作業完成之前，暫止的非同步作業可能會失敗。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會結束暫止的非同步傳送。The following code example ends a pending asynchronous send. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成非同步傳送作業中啟動。 completes the asynchronous send operation started in . 然後再呼叫，您必須建立實作的回呼方法委派。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 這個回呼方法會在個別的執行緒中執行之後, 系統便會呼叫傳回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回呼方法必須接受所傳回做為參數的方法。The callback method must accept the returned by the method as a parameter. 在回呼方法中，呼叫方法參數，以取得傳送。Within the callback method, call the method of the parameter to obtain the sending . 取得之後，您可以呼叫方法成功完成傳送作業，並傳回傳送的位元組數目。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the send operation and return the number of bytes sent. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到傳送資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol, will block until the datagram is sent. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until the requested number of bytes are sent. 則您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路無法保證。There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會結束非同步傳送至特定位置。The following code example ends an asynchronous send to a specific location. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`false`，可以使用多個通訊端方法繫結到特定的連接埠，不過只有其中一個通訊端可以對執行作業傳送至連接埠的網路流量。If is `false`, multiple sockets can use the method to bind to a specific port; however only one of the sockets can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port. 如果多個通訊端嘗試使用方法繫結至特定的連接埠，則具有更特定的 IP 位址，一個會處理傳送到該連接埠的網路流量。If more than one socket attempts to use the method to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address will handle the network traffic sent to that port. 如果是`true`，第一次使用方法，以嘗試繫結至特定的連接埠，不論網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址，將會成功，所有後續的用法會嘗試繫結至該連接埠的方法失敗，直到原始的繫結通訊端被終結。If is `true`, the first use of the method to attempt to bind to a particular port, regardless of Internet Protocol (IP) address, will succeed; all subsequent uses of the method to attempt to bind to that port will fail until the original bound socket is destroyed. 必須先設定此屬性才被呼叫，否則為就會擲回。This property must be set before is called; otherwise an will be thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性變更的方式方法的行為。The property changes the way method behaves. 這個屬性時設定修改用以連接可以重設的 Winsock 的條件。This property when set modifies the conditions under which the connection can be reset by Winsock. 連接重設，仍然會根據 IP 通訊協定行為。Connection resets can still occur based on the IP protocol behavior. 此屬性控制的連線導向的連線會維持開啟狀態之後呼叫的時間長度資料保持傳送。This property controls the length of time that a connection-oriented connection will remain open after a call to when data remains to be sent. 當您呼叫方法，以將資料傳送至對等時，這項資料會在傳出的網路緩衝區中。When you call methods to send data to a peer, this data is placed in the outgoing network buffer. 這個屬性可以用來確保這項資料會傳送到遠端主機，才能進行方法會卸除連接。This property can be used to ensure that this data is sent to the remote host before the method drops the connection. 若要啟用延遲，請建立執行個體包含所需的值，並設定，這個執行個體的屬性。To enable lingering, create a instance containing the desired values, and set the property to this instance. 下表描述的行為方法的可能值屬性並屬性儲存在屬性。The following table describes the behavior of the method for the possible values of the property and the property stored in the property. |LingerState.EnabledLingerState.Enabled|LingerState.LingerTimeLingerState.LingerTime|行為Behavior| |-------------------------|----------------------------|--------------| |`false` （已停用），預設值`false` (disabled), the default value|逾時並不適用，（預設值）。The time-out is not applicable, (default).|嘗試將預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時到期之前傳送暫止資料。Attempts to send pending data until the default IP protocol time-out expires.| |`true` （已啟用）`true` (enabled)|非零的逾時A nonzero time-out|嘗試傳送暫止資料，直到指定的逾時到期，但如果嘗試失敗，然後 Winsock 重設連接。Attempts to send pending data until the specified time-out expires, and if the attempt fails, then Winsock resets the connection.| |`true` （已啟用）`true` (enabled)|零逾時。A zero timeout.|會捨棄任何暫止的資料。Discards any pending data. 連接導向通訊端 (例如 TCP)，Winsock 重設連接。For connection-oriented socket (TCP, for example), Winsock resets the connection.| IP 堆疊預設 IP 通訊協定逾時期限，將會根據計算的連線的來回時間。The IP stack computes the default IP protocol time-out period to use based on the round trip time of the connection. 在大部分情況下，堆疊所計算的逾時則是更為相關應用程式所定義的其中一個項目。In most cases, the time-out computed by the stack is more relevant than one defined by an application. 這是通訊端的預設行為時屬性未設定。This is the default behavior for a socket when the property is not set. 當屬性會儲存在屬性設定為大於預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時，預設 IP 通訊協定等候逾時仍會在套用，並覆寫。When the property stored in the property is set greater than the default IP protocol time-out, the default IP protocol time-out will still apply and override. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 多點傳送是可擴充的方法，在網際網路上的多對多通訊。Multicast is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet. 處理序會訂閱的多點傳送位址;然後，任何已訂閱的程序所傳送的封包都會收到每個訂閱的多點傳送位址的程序。A process subscribes to a multicast address; then, any packets sent by a subscribed process are received by every other process subscribed to the multicast address. 傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指定資料流 是否使用 Nagle 演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the stream is using the Nagle algorithm.

value.span: 如果 使用 Nagle 演算法，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the uses the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Nagle 演算法被設計來減少網路流量造成緩衝小型封包然後結合並在某些情況下一個封包傳送給他們的通訊端。The Nagle algorithm is designed to reduce network traffic by causing the socket to buffer small packets and then combine and send them in one packet under certain circumstances. TCP 封包是由 40 個位元組的標頭加上所傳送之資料所組成。A TCP packet consists of 40 bytes of header plus the data being sent. 當小型資料封包傳送使用 TCP 時，TCP 標頭所產生的額外負荷可能會變得的網路流量的重要部分。在負載極高的網路中，所產生的這項負擔壅塞會導致遺失的資料包和重新傳輸，以及因壅塞的過多的傳播時間而定。When small packets of data are sent with TCP, the overhead resulting from the TCP header can become a significant part of the network traffic.On heavily loaded networks, the congestion resulting from this overhead can result in lost datagrams and retransmissions, as well as excessive propagation time caused by congestion. Nagle 演算法禁止傳送新的 TCP segmentswhen 新傳出資料抵達時向使用者如果在連接上的任何 previouslytransmitted 資料會維持未認可。The Nagle algorithm inhibits the sending of new TCP segmentswhen new outgoing data arrives from the user if any previouslytransmitted data on the connection remains unacknowledged. 大部分的網路應用程式應該使用 Nagle 演算法。The majority of network applications should use the Nagle algorithm. 使用者資料包通訊協定 (UDP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會有任何作用。Setting this property on a User Datagram Protocol (UDP) socket will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CS/class1.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查的狀態。The method will check the state of the . 指定for`selectMode`參數，來判斷如果讀取。Specify for the `selectMode` parameter to determine if the is readable. 指定判斷是可寫入。Specify to determine if the is writable. 使用偵測錯誤狀況。Use to detect an error condition. 將會封鎖執行，直到指定的時間長度，以測量`microseconds`，經過。 will block execution until the specified time period, measured in `microseconds`, elapses. 設定`microSeconds`負整數，如果您想要無限期地等待回應的參數。Set the `microSeconds` parameter to a negative integer if you would like to wait indefinitely for a response. 如果您想要檢查多個通訊端的狀態，您可能會偏好使用方法。If you want to check the status of multiple sockets, you might prefer to use the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法無法偵測某些類型的連線問題，例如中斷的網路纜線，或遠端主機已強制關閉。This method cannot detect certain kinds of connection problems, such as a broken network cable, or that the remote host was shut down ungracefully. 您必須嘗試傳送或接收資料，以偵測這些類型的錯誤。You must attempt to send or receive data to detect these kinds of errors. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立通訊端、 連接到伺服器，並使用檢查通訊端的狀態。The following code example creates a socket, connects to a server, and uses to check the status of the socket. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將資料讀入緩衝區參數並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。The method reads data into the buffer parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read. 您可以呼叫從連線導向和無連線通訊端。You can call from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets. 這個多載只會要求您提供的接收緩衝區。This overload only requires you to provide a receive buffer. 緩衝區位移的預設值為 0，則大小會預設為參數長度的緩衝區，而值預設為。The buffer offset defaults to 0, the size defaults to the length of the buffer parameter, and the value defaults to . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫來連接遠端主機，或是以接受連入連線才能呼叫。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call to establish a remote host connection, or to accept an incoming connection prior to calling . 方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中所建立的資料或方法。The method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the or method. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the method. 可讓您接收任何主機從送達的資料。 will allow you to receive data arriving from any host. 如果沒有資料可供讀取，方法將會封鎖直到資料為止，除非使用已設定的逾時值。If no data is available for reading, the method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 如果您是在非封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料以通訊協定堆疊緩衝區方法會立即完成，並擲回。If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the method will complete immediately and throw a . 您可以使用屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。You can use the property to determine if data is available for reading. 當是不是零，接收作業重試一次。When is non-zero, retry the receive operation. 如果您使用連線導向，則方法會讀取可供使用，但不超過緩衝區的大小的資料量。If you are using a connection-oriented , the method will read as much data as is available, up to the size of the buffer. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. 如果您使用無連接，會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個加入佇列的資料包方法。If you are using a connectionless , will read the first queued datagram from the destination address you specify in the method. 如果您收到的資料包大於的大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`取得填滿與訊息的第一個部分，過多的資料都會遺失，就會擲回。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffer` parameter, `buffer` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會接收上已連接的資料。The following code example receives data on a connected . data is available for reading. 當是不是零，接收作業重試一次。When is non-zero, retry the receive operation. 如果您使用連線導向，則方法會讀取可供使用，但不超過緩衝區的大小的資料量。If you are using a connection-oriented , the method will read as much connection-oriented and connectionless sockets. 這個多載只要求您提供的接收緩衝區中，您想要接收的位元組和必要的數目。This overload only requires you to provide a receive buffer, the number of bytes you want to receive, and the necessary . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫來連接遠端主機，或是以接受連入連線才能呼叫。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call to establish a remote host connection, or to accept an incoming connection prior to calling . 方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中所建立的資料或方法。The method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the or method. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the method. 可讓您接收任何主機從送達的資料。 will allow you to receive data arriving from any host. 如果沒有資料可供讀取，方法將會封鎖直到資料為止，除非使用已設定的逾時值。If no data is available for reading, the method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 如果您是在非封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料以通訊協定堆疊緩衝區方法會立即完成，並擲回。If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, The method will complete immediately and throw a . 您可以使用屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。You can use the property to determine if data is available for reading. 當是不是零，再試一次您接收作業。When is non-zero, retry your receive operation. 如果您使用連線導向，則方法會讀取可供使用，最多所指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數。If you are using a connection-oriented , the method will read as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection read the first queued datagram from the destination address you specify in the method. 如果您收到的資料包大於的大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`取得填滿與訊息的第一個部分，過多的資料都會遺失，就會擲回。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將資料讀入緩衝區參數並傳回成功讀取的位元組數目。The method reads data into the buffer parameter and returns the number of bytes successfully read. 您可以呼叫從連線導向和無連線通訊端。You can call from both connection-oriented and connectionless sockets. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須呼叫來連接遠端主機，或是以接受連入連線才能呼叫。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either call to establish a remote host connection, or to accept an incoming connection prior to calling . 方法只會讀取來自遠端主機中所建立的資料或方法。The method will only read data that arrives from the remote host established in the or method. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您也可以使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you can also use the method. 可讓您接收任何主機從送達的資料。 will allow you to receive data arriving from any host. 如果沒有資料可供讀取，方法將會封鎖直到資料為止，除非使用已設定的逾時值。If no data is available for reading, the method will block until data is available, unless a time-out value was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 如果您是在非封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料以通訊協定堆疊緩衝區方法會立即完成，並擲回。If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the method will complete immediately and throw a . 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。An error occurred when attempting to access the socket. 請參閱下方註解。See Remarks below. 您可以使用屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。You can use the property to determine if data is available for reading. 當是不是零，接收作業重試一次。When is non-zero, retry the receive operation. 如果您使用連線導向，則方法會讀取可供使用，最多的 size 參數所指定的位元組數目的資料量。If you are using a connection-oriented , the method will read as much data as is available, up to the number of bytes specified by the size parameter. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. 如果您使用無連接，會從您在中指定的目的地位址讀取第一個加入佇列的資料包方法。If you are using a connectionless , will read the first queued datagram from the destination address you specify in the method. 如果您收到的資料包大於的大小`buffer`參數，`buffer`取得填滿與訊息的第一個部分，過多的資料都會遺失，就會擲回。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of the `buffer` parameter, `buffer` gets filled with the first part of the message, the excess data is lost and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可在連線通訊端或繫結的無連線通訊端和用來讀取內送資料。The method is used on connected sockets or bound connectionless sockets and is used to read incoming data. 必須知道通訊端的本機位址。The socket's local address must be known. 繫結的無連線通訊端，此函式會限制已接受已接收的訊息的位址。For bound connectionless sockets, this function restricts the addresses from which received messages are accepted. 函式只會傳回在連接中指定的遠端位址的訊息。The function only returns messages from the remote address specified in the connection. 以無訊息模式已捨棄來自其他位址的訊息。Messages from other addresses are silently discarded. 屬性上的`e`參數提供的視窗通訊端服務提供者的其他讀取要求的相關資訊。The property on the `e` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the read request. 如需如何使用此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 下列的屬性和事件物件，才能成功呼叫這個方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - 或 or - 如果設定 if is set - 如果設定 if is set - 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 位元組資料流樣式的通訊端，內送資料被放入緩衝區，直到緩衝區已滿、 關閉連線，或已用完內部緩衝的資料。For byte stream-style sockets, incoming data is placed into the buffer until the buffer is filled, the connection is closed, or the internally buffered data is exhausted. 訊息導向的通訊端，內送訊息會放入之前的相關聯的緩衝區大小總計的緩衝區`e`參數。For message-oriented sockets, an incoming message is placed into the buffer up to the total size of the buffer associated with the `e` parameter. 如果訊息大於緩衝區，緩衝區會填入訊息的第一個部分。If the message is larger than the buffer, the buffer is filled with the first part of the message. 連線導向的通訊端，方法可以指定其中一種取決於通訊端是位元組資料流或訊息導向的兩個此虛擬電路正常終止。For connection-oriented sockets, the method can indicate the graceful termination of the virtual circuit in one of two ways that depend on whether the socket is byte stream or message oriented. 已讀取的零位元組位元組資料流，表示正常關閉，以往會讀取任何更多的位元組。For byte streams, zero bytes having been read indicates graceful closure and that no more bytes will ever be read. 訊息導向通訊端，其中通常是可允許零位元組的訊息，如與設為原生的 Winsock WSAEDISCON 錯誤程式碼 (10101) 用來表示非失誤性結束。For message-oriented sockets, where a zero byte message is often allowable, a with the set to the native Winsock WSAEDISCON error code (10101) is used to indicate graceful closure. 在任何情況下，與設為原生的 Winsock WSAECONNRESET 錯誤碼 (10054) 會指出發生失敗的關閉。In any case, a with the set to the native Winsock WSAECONNRESET error code (10054) indicates an abortive close has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 較大的緩衝區大小可能減少的空白通知 （TCP 封包，沒有資料部分），但也可能會延遲連線困難的辨識。A larger buffer size potentially reduces the number of empty acknowledgements (TCP packets with no data portion), but might also delay the recognition of connection difficulties. 請考慮增加緩衝區大小，如果您正在傳送大型檔案，或您使用的高頻寬、 高延遲連線 （例如衛星寬頻提供者。）Consider increasing the buffer size if you are transferring large files, or you are using a high bandwidth, high latency connection (such as a satellite broadband provider.) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CS/class1.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，會傳回成功讀取的位元組數目，並擷取資料已傳送遠端主機端點。The method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, returns the number of bytes successfully read, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data was sent. 這個方法很有用，如果您想要收到未知的主機或多個主控件的無連接的資料包。This method is useful if you intend to receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. 這個多載只要求您提供接收`buffer`，並有表示遠端主機。This overload only requires you to provide a receive `buffer`, and an that represents the remote host. 緩衝區位移為 0 的預設值。The buffer offset defaults to 0. 大小的預設值的長度`buffer`參數與`socketFlags`值預設為。The size defaults to the length of the `buffer` parameter and the `socketFlags` value defaults to . > [!NOTE] > 然後再呼叫，您必須明確地繫結本機端點使用方法。Before calling , you must explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method. 如果您未這麼做，將會擲回。If you do not, will throw a . 無連接的通訊協定，會讀取到區域網路緩衝區收到第一個加入佇列的資料包。With connectionless protocols, will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer. 如果您收到的資料包大於的大小`buffer`，則方法將會填滿`buffer`盡可能是盡可能，，並擲回的訊息與。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a . 如果您使用的不可靠的通訊協定，超過的資料將會遺失。If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost. 如果您使用可靠的通訊協定、 過多的資料會保留由服務提供者，而且您可以呼叫來擷取夠大的緩衝區的方法。If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the method with a large enough buffer. 如果沒有資料可供讀取，方法將會封鎖直到資料可供使用。If no data is available for reading, the method will block until data is available. 如果您是在非封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料以通訊協定堆疊緩衝區方法會立即完成，並擲回。If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the method will complete immediately and throw a . 您可以使用屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。You can use the property to determine if data is available for reading. 當是不是零，接收作業重試一次。When is non-zero, retry the receive operation. 雖然適用於無連線的通訊協定，您可以使用連線導向的通訊協定以及。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果您選擇這樣做，您必須先請建立遠端主機連接藉由呼叫方法，或接受連入遠端主機連線，藉由呼叫方法。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming remote host connection by calling the method. 如果您不要建立或接受連接，然後再呼叫方法，將會取得。If you do not establish or accept a connection before calling the method, you will get a . 您也可以建立預設遠端主機的無連線的通訊協定，才能呼叫方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在這些情況下，任一方法將會忽略`remoteEP`參數和只接收來自已連接的資料或預設遠端主機。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 使用連線導向的通訊端將讀取的大小可用的資料量`buffer`。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the size of `buffer`. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 的用於必須符合的用於。The of the used in needs to match the of the used in . > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將無資料包 (datagram) 接收遠端主機。The following code example receives a connectionless datagram from a remote host. complete immediately and throw a . 您可以使用屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。You can use the property to determine if data is available for reading. 當是不是零，接收作業重試一次。When is non-zero, retry the receive operation. 雖然適用於無連線的通訊協定，您可以使用連線導向的通訊協定以及。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果您選擇這樣做，您必須先請建立遠端主機連接藉由呼叫方法，或接受連入遠端主機連線，藉由呼叫方法。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming remote host connection by calling the method. 如果您不要建立或接受連接，然後再呼叫方法，將會取得。If you do not establish or accept a connection before calling the method, you will get a . 您也可以建立預設遠端主機的無連線的通訊協定，才能呼叫方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在這些情況下，任一方法將會忽略`remoteEP`參數和只接收來自已連接的資料或預設遠端主機。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 使用連線導向的通訊端將讀取的大小可用的資料量`buffer`。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the size of `buffer`. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been Received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 的用於必須符合的用於。The of the used in needs to match the of the used in . > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將無資料包 (datagram) 接收遠端主機。The following code example receives a remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，會傳回成功讀取的位元組數目，並擷取資料已傳送遠端主機端點。The method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, returns the number of bytes successfully read, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data was sent. 這個方法很有用，如果您想要收到未知的主機或多個主控件的無連接的資料包。This method is useful if you intend to receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. 這個多載只要求您提供接收緩衝區中，您想要接收，必要的位元組數目，並有表示遠端主機。This overload only requires you to provide a receive buffer, the number of bytes you want to receive, the necessary , and an that represents the remote host. 緩衝區位移為 0 的預設值。The buffer offset defaults to 0. 無連接的通訊協定，會讀取到區域網路緩衝區收到第一個加入佇列的資料包。With connectionless protocols, will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer. 如果您收到的資料包大於的大小`buffer`，則方法將會填滿`buffer`盡可能是盡可能，，並擲回的訊息與。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a . 如果您使用的不可靠的通訊協定，超過的資料將會遺失。If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost. 如果您使用可靠的通訊協定、 過多的資料會保留由服務提供者，而且您可以呼叫來擷取夠大的緩衝區的方法。If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the method with a large enough buffer. 如果沒有資料可供讀取，方法將會封鎖直到資料可供使用。If no data is available for reading, the method will block until data is available. 如果您是在非封鎖模式中，而且沒有使用中的資料以通訊協定堆疊緩衝區方法會立即完成，並擲回。If you are in non-blocking mode, and there is no data available in the in the protocol stack buffer, the method will complete immediately and throw a . 您可以使用屬性來判斷資料是否可供讀取。You can use the property to determine if data is available for reading. 當是不是零，接收作業重試一次。When is non-zero, retry the receive operation. 雖然適用於無連線的通訊協定，您可以使用連線導向的通訊協定以及。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果您選擇這樣做，您必須先請建立遠端主機連接藉由呼叫方法，或接受連入遠端主機連線，藉由呼叫方法。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming remote host connection by calling the method. 如果您不要建立或接受連接，然後再呼叫方法，將會取得。If you do not establish or accept a connection before calling the method, you will get a . 您也可以建立預設遠端主機的無連線的通訊協定，才能呼叫方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在這些情況下，任一方法將會忽略`remoteEP`參數和只接收來自已連接的資料或預設遠端主機。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 使用連線導向的通訊端會讀取位於不超過所指定的位元組數目的資料量`size`參數。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 如果遠端主機已關閉與連接方法，以及所有可用的資料已收到，方法會立即完成，並傳回零個位元組。If the remote host shuts down the connection with the method, and all available data has been received, the method will complete immediately and return zero bytes. > [!NOTE] > 然後再呼叫，您必須明確地繫結本機端點使用方法。Before calling , you must explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method. 如果您未這麼做，將會擲回。If you do not, will throw a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 的用於必須符合的用於。The of the used in needs to match the of the used in . > [!NOTE] > remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要用來接收無連線的通訊端上的資料。The method is used primarily to receive data on a connectionless socket. 必須知道通訊端的本機位址。The socket's local address must be known. 呼叫端必須將屬性設為接收資料來源的遠端主機。The caller must set the property to the of the remote host from which the data is to be received. 屬性上的`e`參數提供的視窗通訊端服務提供者的其他讀取要求的相關資訊。The property on the `e` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the read request. 如需如何使用此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 下列的屬性和事件物件，才能成功呼叫這個方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - - - - 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 訊息導向的通訊端，內送訊息會放入之前將緩衝區的總大小的緩衝區。For message-oriented sockets, an incoming message is placed into the buffer up to the total size of the buffer. 和屬性決定放置資料緩衝區的位置及的資料量。The and properties determine where in the buffer the data is placed and the amount of data. 位元組資料流樣式的通訊端，內送資料被放入緩衝區，直到緩衝區已滿、 關閉連線，或已用完內部緩衝的資料。For byte stream–style sockets, incoming data is placed into the buffer until the buffer is filled, the connection is closed, or the internally buffered data is exhausted. 和屬性決定放置資料緩衝區的位置及的資料量。The and properties determine where in the buffer the data is placed and the amount of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會讀取資料到`buffer`參數，會傳回成功讀取的位元組數目，並擷取遠端主機資料已傳送的端點，以及收到的封包的相關資訊。The method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, returns the number of bytes successfully read, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data was sent, as well as information about the received packet. 方法主要用來接收無連線的通訊端上的訊息資料。The method is used primarily to receive message data on a connectionless socket. 必須知道通訊端的本機位址。The socket's local address must be known. 這個方法只會搭配資料包和原始通訊端中。This method can only be used with datagram and raw sockets. 通訊端必須先初始化通訊端類型設定為或之前呼叫這個方法。The socket must be initialized with the socket type set to or before calling this method. 這可以使用建構通訊端時。This can be done when the socket is constructed using . 訊息導向的通訊端，內送訊息會放入`buffer`參數中指定的總大小最`size`參數。For message-oriented sockets, an incoming message is placed into the `buffer` parameter up to the total size specified in the `size` parameter. `offset`參數會決定在何處`buffer`將資料放在。The `offset` parameter determines where in the `buffer` the data is placed. 實際的資料量放入`buffer`由方法。The actual amount of data placed into the `buffer` is returned by the method. 方法會自動設定方法通訊端選項來`true`呼叫的第一次指定。The method automatically method sets the socket option to `true` the first time it is called for a given . 不過，傳回物件只會對封包抵達本機電腦，設定通訊端選項之後有效。However, the returned object will only be valid for packets which arrive at the local computer after the socket option has been set. 如果通訊端會傳送之間的封包，當它繫結至本機端點 (明確地方法或由其中一個隱含， ， ，或方法) 和其第一次呼叫若要呼叫的方法，方法會傳回無效這些封包的物件。If a socket is sent packets between when it is bound to a local endpoint (explicitly by the method or implicitly by one of the , , , or methods) and its first call to the method, calls to method will return invalid objects for these packets. 為了確保所有物件有效，而且應用程式應該設定通訊端選項來`true`它會繫結至本機端點使用之前方法。To ensure that all objects are valid, an application should set the socket option to `true` before it is bound to a local endpoint using the method. 應用程式可以檢查`ipPacketInformation`參數，如果它需要知道是否資料包所傳送的單點傳播、 多點傳送或廣播位址。An application can examine the `ipPacketInformation` parameter if it needs to know if the datagram was sent using a unicast, multicast, or broadcast address. > [!NOTE] > 的用於必須符合的用於。The of the used in needs to match the of the used in . > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要用來接收無連線的通訊端上的訊息資料。The method is used primarily to receive message data on a connectionless socket. 必須知道通訊端的本機位址。The socket's local address must be known. 這個方法只會搭配資料包和原始通訊端中。This method can only be used with datagram and raw sockets. 通訊端必須先初始化通訊端類型設定為或之前呼叫這個方法。The socket must be initialized with the socket type set to or before calling this method. 這可以使用建構通訊端時。This can be done when the socket is constructed using . 呼叫端必須將屬性設為接收資料來源的遠端主機。The caller must set the property to the of the remote host from which the data is to be received. 下列的屬性和事件物件，才能成功呼叫這個方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - - - - 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 訊息導向的通訊端，內送訊息會放入之前將緩衝區的總大小的緩衝區。For message-oriented sockets, an incoming message is placed into the buffer up to the total size of the buffer. 和屬性決定放置資料緩衝區的位置及的資料量。The and properties determine where in the buffer the data is placed and the amount of data. 方法會自動設定通訊端選項來`true`呼叫的第一次指定。The method automatically sets the socket option to `true` the first time it is called for a given . 不過，物件只會對封包抵達本機電腦，設定通訊端選項之後有效。However, the object will only be valid for packets which arrive at the local computer after the socket option has been set. 如果通訊端通訊端繫結至本機端點時傳送封包之間 (明確地方法或由其中一個隱含， ， ，或方法) 和第一個呼叫方法，呼叫方法將會導致無效這些封包的物件。If a socket is sent packets between when the socket is bound to a local endpoint (explicitly by the method or implicitly by one of the , , , or methods) and the first call to the method, calls to method will result in invalid objects for these packets. 為了確保所有物件有效，而且應用程式應該設定通訊端選項來`true`它會繫結至本機端點使用之前方法。To ensure that all objects are valid, an application should set the socket option to`true` before it is bound to a local endpoint using the method. 應用程式可以檢查所產生的物件是否需要知道是否資料包所傳送的單點傳播、 多點傳送或廣播位址。An application can examine the resulting objects if it needs to know if the datagram was sent using a unicast, multicast, or broadcast address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，屬性會取得包含遠端 IP 位址和連接埠號碼的連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the property gets the that contains the remote IP address and port number to which the is connected. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定包含的預設遠端 IP 位址和連接埠號碼與會進行通訊。If you are using a connectionless protocol, contains the default remote IP address and port number with which the will communicate. 您必須將此轉型至之前擷取任何資訊。You must cast this to an before retrieving any information. 您可以接著呼叫方法來擷取遠端，和方法來擷取遠端連接埠號碼。You can then call the method to retrieve the remote , and the method to retrieve the remote port number. 設定後呼叫或。The is set after a call to either or . 如果您嘗試存取此屬性稍早將會擲回。If you try to access this property earlier, will throw a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取，並顯示本機和遠端端點。The following code example retrieves and displays the local and remote endpoints. summary.span: 判斷一或多個通訊端的狀態。

span.span: Determines the status of one or more sockets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種靜態方法，決定一或多個狀態執行個體。 is a static method that determines the status of one or more instances. 您必須將放入一或多個通訊端您可以使用之前方法。You must place one or more sockets into an before you can use the method. 藉由呼叫檢查可讀性具有做為`checkRead`參數。Check for readability by calling with the as the `checkRead` parameter. 若要檢查可寫性通訊端，使用`checkWrite`參數。To check your sockets for writability, use the `checkWrite` parameter. 偵測錯誤狀況，使用`checkError`。For detecting error conditions, use `checkError`. 之後呼叫，則會填滿滿足上述條件的通訊端。After calling , the will be filled with only those sockets that satisfy the conditions. 如果您是處於接聽狀態，可讀性表示呼叫而不會封鎖將會成功。If you are in a listening state, readability means that a call to will succeed without blocking. 如果您已接受連線，可讀性表示資料可供讀取。If you have already accepted the connection, readability means that data is available for reading. 在這些情況下，所有的接收作業會成功，而不會封鎖。In these cases, all receive operations will succeed without blocking. 可讀性也可以指定是否在遠端已關閉連接下，在此情況下呼叫會立即傳回，以傳回零位元組。Readability can also indicate whether the remote has shut down the connection; in that case a call to will return immediately, with zero bytes returned. 時傳回至少一個感興趣的通訊端 (在通訊端`checkRead`， `checkWrite`，並`checkError`列出) 符合指定的準則，或`microSeconds`超過參數時，視何者先。 returns when at least one of the sockets of interest (the sockets in the `checkRead`, `checkWrite`, and `checkError` lists) meets its specified criteria, or the `microSeconds` parameter is exceeded, whichever comes first. 設定`microSeconds`為-1 指定無限逾時。Setting `microSeconds` to -1 specifies an infinite time-out. 若要以非封鎖式呼叫，可寫性表示您已成功連線。If you make a nonblocking call to , writability means that you have connected successfully. 如果您已經建立連接，可寫性表示，所有傳送作業會成功而不會封鎖。If you already have a connection established, writability means that all send operations will succeed without blocking. 如果您所做的非封鎖式呼叫，則`checkerror`參數會識別尚未成功連線的通訊端。If you have made a non-blocking call to , the `checkerror` parameter identifies sockets that have not connected successfully. > [!NOTE] > 使用方法，如果您只想要判斷的單一狀態。Use the method if you only want to determine the status of a single . > [!NOTE] > 這個方法無法偵測某些類型的連線問題，例如中斷的網路纜線，或遠端主機已強制關閉。This method cannot detect certain kinds of connection problems, such as a broken network cable, or that the remote host was shut down ungracefully. 您必須嘗試傳送或接收資料，以偵測這些類型的錯誤。You must attempt to send or receive data to detect these kinds of errors. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用判斷哪一個接聽的通訊端連線要求。The following code example uses to determine which listening sockets have a connection request. [!code-cpp[Socket_Select#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Select/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Select#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Select/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Select#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Select/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以同步方式將資料傳送至遠端主機中指定或方法並傳回成功傳送的位元組數目。 synchronously sends data to the remote host specified in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 可用的連線導向和無連線通訊協定。 can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 這個多載都需要此緩衝區包含您想要傳送的資料。This overload requires a buffer that contains the data you want to send. 值會預設為 0，緩衝區位移為 0，而且要傳送的緩衝區大小的預設值的位元組數目的預設值。The value defaults to 0, the buffer offset defaults to 0, and the number of bytes to send defaults to the size of the buffer. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您必須呼叫之前呼叫這個方法，或是將會擲回。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須使用建立遠端主機連線，或使用以接受連入連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送至數個不同的主控件，您應該使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use the method. 如果您不要使用方法中，您必須呼叫每次呼叫之前。If you do not use the method, you will have to call before each call to . 您可以使用即使您已建立預設遠端主機與之後。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，才能呼叫藉由另一個呼叫。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到所有緩衝區的位元組傳送，除非逾時已設定使用。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until all of the bytes in the buffer are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在未封鎖模式中，即使傳送的位元組數目小於緩衝區中可能會順利完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes in the buffer. 是記錄傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式可將位元組傳送緩衝區中的應用程式的責任。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the bytes in the buffer. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在已連接的資料傳送。The following code example demonstrates sending data on a connected . remarks.format: ## Remarks 以同步方式將資料傳送至遠端主機中建立或方法並傳回成功傳送的位元組數目。 synchronously sends data to the remote host established in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 方法可以用於連接導向和無連線的通訊協定。The method can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 這個多載都需要此緩衝區包含您想要傳送的資料和的位元組合。This overload requires a buffer that contains the data you want to send and a bitwise combination of . 緩衝區位移為 0，而且要傳送的緩衝區大小的預設值的位元組數目的預設值。The buffer offset defaults to 0, and the number of bytes to send defaults to the size of the buffer. 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketflags`參數值、 您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter value, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您必須呼叫之前呼叫這個方法，或是將會擲回。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須使用建立遠端主機連線，或使用以接受連入連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host the method. 如果您不要使用方法中，您必須呼叫方法，然後再每次呼叫。If you do not use the method, you will have to call the method before each call to . 您可以使用即使您已建立預設遠端主機與之後。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，才能呼叫藉由另一個呼叫。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到所有緩衝區的位元組傳送，除非逾時已設定使用。If you are using a 在未封鎖模式中，即使傳送的位元組數目小於緩衝區中可能會順利完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes in the buffer. 負責您的應用程式來追蹤已傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式傳送要求的位元組數目。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send.
