remarks.format: ## Remarks 以同步方式將資料傳送至遠端主機中建立或方法並傳回成功傳送的位元組數目。 synchronously sends data to the remote host established in the or method and returns the number of bytes successfully sent. 可用的連線導向和無連線通訊協定。 can be used for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols. 這個多載都需要包含您想要傳送，您想要傳送的位元組數目的位元組合的任何的資料的緩衝區。This overload requires a buffer that contains the data you want to send, the number of bytes you want to send, and a bitwise combination of any . 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您必須呼叫之前呼叫這個方法，或是將會擲回。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須使用建立遠端主機連線，或使用以接受連入連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送至數個不同的主控件，您應該使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use the method. 如果您不要使用方法中，您必須呼叫方法，然後再每次呼叫方法。If you do not use the method, you will have to call the method before each call to the method. 您可以使用即使您已建立預設遠端主機與之後。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，才能呼叫藉由另一個呼叫。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目，除非逾時已設定使用。With a connection-oriented protocol, will block until the requested number of bytes are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在未封鎖模式中，即使傳送小於您要求的位元組數目可能會順利完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes you request. 負責您的應用程式來追蹤已傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式傳送要求的位元組數目。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 您必須確定大小不超過最大的封包大小為基礎的服務提供者。You must ensure that the size does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將傳送緩衝區中找到的資料，並指定針對。The following code example sends the data found in buffer, and specifies for . [!code-cpp[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Socket_Sync_Send_Receive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Sync_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載都需要至少一個緩衝區，其中包含您想要傳送的資料。This overload requires at least one buffer that contains the data you want to send. 值預設為 0。The value defaults to 0. 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketFlags`參數，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketFlags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您必須呼叫之前呼叫這個方法，或是將會擲回。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, or will throw a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須使用建立遠端主機連線，或使用以接受連入連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果您使用無連線的通訊協定和計劃將資料傳送至數個不同的主控件，您應該使用方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use the method. 如果您不要使用方法中，您必須呼叫每次呼叫之前。If you do not use the method, you will have to call before each call to . 您可以使用即使您已建立預設遠端主機與之後。You can use even after you have established a default remote host with . 您也可以變更預設遠端主機，才能呼叫藉由另一個呼叫。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到所有緩衝區的位元組傳送，除非逾時已設定使用。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until all of the bytes in the buffer are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在非封鎖模式中，即使傳送的位元組數目小於緩衝區中可能會順利完成。In non-blocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes in the buffer. 是記錄傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式可將位元組傳送緩衝區中的應用程式的責任。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the bytes in the buffer. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，將會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目，除非逾時已設定使用。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will block until the requested number of bytes are sent, unless a time-out was set by using . 如果已超過逾時值呼叫會擲回。If the time-out value was exceeded, the call will throw a . 在未封鎖模式中，即使傳送小於您要求的位元組數目可能會順利完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully even if it sends less than the number of bytes you request. 負責您的應用程式來追蹤已傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式傳送要求的位元組數目。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成傳送不表示已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果沒有緩衝區可用空間來保存資料傳輸的傳輸系統內，則除非通訊端已處於未封鎖模式，將會封鎖傳送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來從連線導向的通訊端上的一個或多個緩衝區寫入輸出資料。The method is used to write outgoing data from one or more buffers on a connection-oriented socket. 這個方法也可用，不過，在無連接的通訊端 connect 作業指定遠端主機上。This method can also be used, however, on connectionless sockets that have specified a remote host on a connect operation. 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中所建立的遠端主機， ， ， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , , , or method. 下列的屬性和事件物件，才能成功呼叫這個方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - 或 or - 如果設定 if is set - 如果設定 if is set - 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 方法會擲回例外狀況，如果您未先呼叫， ， ， ，或。The method will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , , or . 呼叫方法可讓您能夠傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 訊息導向的通訊端，不會超過訊息大小上限為基礎的 Windows 通訊端服務提供者。For message-oriented sockets, do not exceed the maximum message size of the underlying Windows sockets service provider. 如果資料太長而無法透過基礎的服務提供者以不可分割方式傳遞，則傳送任何資料而方法會擲回使用設為原生的 Winsock WSAEMSGSIZE 錯誤程式碼 (10040)。If the data is too long to pass atomically through the underlying service provider, no data is transmitted and the method throws a with the set to the native Winsock WSAEMSGSIZE error code (10040). 請注意，成功完成方法不會指出已成功傳遞資料。Note that the successful completion of the method does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 較大的緩衝區大小可能會延遲連線困難的辨識。A larger buffer size might delay the recognition of connection difficulties. 請考慮增加緩衝區大小，如果您正在傳送大型檔案，或您使用的高頻寬、 高延遲連線 （例如衛星寬頻提供者。）Consider increasing the buffer size if you are transferring large files, or you are using a high bandwidth, high latency connection (such as a satellite broadband provider.) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載會將該檔案傳送`fileName`要連接的通訊端。This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket. `flags`參數的預設值(0)，而`preBuffer`並`postBuffer`參數預設為`null`。The `flags` parameter defaults to (0), and the `preBuffer` and `postBuffer` parameters default to `null`. 如果`fileName`是在本機目錄中，它可能會用來識別檔案的名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案的名稱。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 萬用字元 ("...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共用名稱 ("\\\\\\\shared 目錄\\\myfile.txt 」) 支援。Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果檔案找不到，例外狀況就會擲回。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. 這個方法會使用`TransmitFile`函式位於 Windows Sockets 2 API。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 如需詳細資訊`TransmitFile`函式和它的旗標，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows 通訊端文件。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 以同步方式將檔案傳送至遠端主機中指定或方法。 synchronously sends a file to the remote host specified in the or method. 可用來同時連線導向及無連線的通訊協定。 can be used for both connection-oriented and for connectionless protocols. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您必須呼叫呼叫這個方法之前，否則為就會擲回例外狀況。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method, otherwise throws a exception. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須使用來建立連接遠端主機，或使用以接受連入連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，封鎖，直到傳送檔案。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, blocks until the file is sent. 在未封鎖模式中，可能會傳送整個檔案之前順利完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully before the entire file has been sent. 則您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路無法保證。There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和連接通訊端，並再將檔案傳送至遠端主機。The following code example creates and connects a socket and then sends a file to the remote host. 檔案"test.txt"位於本機電腦的根目錄。The file "test.txt" is located in the root directory of the local machine. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載都需要您想要傳送的檔案和的位元組合名稱值。This overload requires the name of the file you want to send and a bitwise combination of values. `preBuffer`參數包含您想要在檔案的所有資料。The `preBuffer` parameter contains any data you want to precede the file. `postBuffer` 包含您想要按照檔案中的資料。`postBuffer` contains data you want to follow the file. 如果`fileName`是在目前的工作目錄中，它可能會用來識別檔案的名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案的名稱。If `fileName` is in the current working directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 萬用字元 ("...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共用名稱 ("\\\\\\\shared 目錄\\\myfile.txt 」) 支援。Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. `flags`參數提供的視窗通訊端服務提供者的檔案傳輸的其他資訊。The `flags` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the file transfer. 如需如何使用此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 這個方法會使用`TransmitFile`函式位於 Windows Sockets 2 API。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 如需詳細資訊`TransmitFile`函式和它的旗標，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows 通訊端文件。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 以同步方式將檔案傳送至遠端主機中指定或方法。 synchronously sends a file to the remote host specified in the or method. 可用來同時連線導向及無連線的通訊協定。 can be used for both connection-oriented and for connectionless protocols. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您必須呼叫之前呼叫這個方法; 否則為就會擲回。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you must call before calling this method; otherwise throws a . 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須使用建立遠端主機連線，或使用以接受連入連線。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must either use to establish a remote host connection, or use to accept an incoming connection. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，封鎖，直到傳送整個檔案。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, blocks until the entire file is sent. 在未封鎖模式中，可能會傳送整個檔案之前順利完成。In nonblocking mode, may complete successfully before the entire file has been sent. 則您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路無法保證。There is no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並連接通訊端。The following code example creates and connects a socket. 檔案"test.txt"位於本機電腦的根目錄。The file "test.txt" is located in the root directory of the local machine. 在此範例中，我們會建立緩衝和後置的資料，並將它們傳送至遠端主機的檔案。In this example, we create a prebuffer and postbuffer of data and send them to the remote host with the file. 預設值習慣。The default are used. span.span: In this case, The event on the parameter will not be raised and the object passed as a parameter may be examined immediately after the method call returns to retrieve the result of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將集合的檔案，或在記憶體中資料緩衝區傳送至遠端主機。The method is used to send a collection of files or in memory data buffers to remote host. 必須先連接至遠端主機。The must already be connected to the remote host. 如果參考的工作目錄中的檔案，可能會用來識別它的檔案名稱; 否則必須指定完整路徑和檔案的名稱。If a references a file in the working directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 支援萬用字元和 UNC 共用名稱。Wildcards and UNC share names are supported. 如果找不到檔案，就會擲回。If the file is not found, is thrown. 若要完成的通知，您必須建立實作事件處理常式的回呼方法\ 委派，並將附加的回呼事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 屬性上的`e`參數提供的視窗通訊端服務提供者的檔案傳輸的其他資訊。The property on the `e` parameter provides the Window Sockets service provider with additional information about the file transfer. 如需如何使用此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about how to use this parameter, see . 下列的屬性和事件物件，才能成功呼叫這個方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 這個方法會使用位於 Windows Sockets 2 API TransmitPackets 函式。This method uses the TransmitPackets function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 如需有關 TransmitPackets 函式和其旗標的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows 通訊端文件。For more information about the TransmitPackets function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 適用於連線導向的通訊協定，雖然方法也適用於無連線的通訊協定，前提是您第一次呼叫， ，或方法，以建立預設遠端主機。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, the method also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the , , or method to establish a default remote host. 您也必須確定檔案的大小未超過最大的封包大小為基礎的服務提供者無連接的通訊協定。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，不會傳送資料包並會擲回例外狀況。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. 方法最適合根據在其使用的作業系統。The method is optimized according to the operating system on which it is used. 在 Windows server 版本，方法最適合用於高效能。On Windows server editions, the method is optimized for high performance. 在 Windows 用戶端版本，方法最適合用於最小記憶體和資源使用率。On Windows client editions, the method is optimized for minimum memory and resource utilization. 使用的中的旗標屬性上的`e`參數可提供顯著的效能優點。Use of the flag in the property on the `e` parameter can deliver significant performance benefits. 如果執行緒起始方法呼叫用於大量的計算，您可以，但不太可能，Apc 可能無法啟動。If the thread initiating the method call is being used for heavy computations, it is possible, though unlikely, that APCs could be prevented from launching. 請注意，核心和使用者模式的 Apc 之間的差異。Note that there is a difference between kernel and user-mode APCs. 當執行緒處於等候狀態時，就會啟動核心 Apc。Kernel APCs launch when a thread is in a wait state. 當執行緒在可警示等待狀態時，會啟動使用者模式 ApcUser-mode APCs launch when a thread is in an alertable wait state

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定同步 呼叫逾時之前的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the amount of time after which a synchronous call will time out.

value.span: 逾時值 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The time-out value, in milliseconds.

value.span: 如果您將屬性設為 1 到 499 之間的值，則會將值變更為 500。

span.span: If you set the property with a value between 1 and 499, the value will be changed to 500.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示無限的逾時期間。

span.span: The default value is 0, which indicates an infinite time-out period.

value.span: 指定 -1 也表示無限的逾時期間。

span.span: Specifying -1 also indicates an infinite time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在這個多載，緩衝區位移為 0 時，要傳送的大小的預設值的位元組數目的預設值`buffer`參數，而值預設為 0。In this overload, the buffer offset defaults to 0, the number of bytes to send defaults to the size of the `buffer` parameter, and the value defaults to 0. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不需要建立的預設遠端主機方法之前呼叫。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the method prior to calling . 您只需要這樣做，如果您想要呼叫方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果您呼叫方法之前呼叫，則`remoteEP`參數會覆寫指定的預設遠端主機，可傳送作業才。If you do call the method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 您也不需要呼叫方法，因為基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的區域網路位址和連接埠號碼。You are also not required to call the method, because the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您需要識別指派的本機網路位址和連接埠號碼，您可以使用屬性之後方法成功完成。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 適用於無連線的通訊協定，雖然也適用於使用連線導向的通訊協定。Although intended for connectionless protocols, also works with connection-oriented protocols. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須先透過呼叫建立連接遠端主機方法，或接受連入的連接要求使用方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming connection request using the method. 如果您不要建立或接受連接遠端主機將會擲回。If you do not establish or accept a remote host connection, will throw a . 您也可以建立預設遠端主機的無連線的通訊協定，才能呼叫方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在這些情況下，任一將會忽略`remoteEP`參數並只將資料傳送至已連接或預設遠端主機。In either of these cases, will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only send data to the connected or default remote host. 封鎖通訊端，將會封鎖直到傳送的所有位元組緩衝區中。Blocking sockets will block until the all of the bytes in the buffer are sent. 因為未封鎖完成立即執行，它可能會不傳送的位元組中的所有`buffer`。Since a nonblocking completes immediately, it might not send all of the bytes in the `buffer`. 您的應用程式必須負責記錄傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式傳送的位元組中的所有`buffer`。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends all of the bytes in the `buffer`. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of outgoing data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. 如果您在封鎖模式中，使用無連接的通訊協定將會封鎖直到傳送資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol in blocking mode, will block until the datagram is sent. 如果您想要將資料傳送至的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫方法，並設定通訊端選項設定為。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . 您也必須確定傳送的位元組數目未超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包大小。You must also be sure that the number of bytes sent does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將無連線的資料包傳送至指定的遠端主機。The following code example sends a connectionless datagram to the specified remote host. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在這個多載，緩衝區位移為 0 的預設值。In this overload, the buffer offset defaults to 0. 如果您指定旗標標示為`socketflags`參數，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不需要建立的預設遠端主機方法之前呼叫。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the method prior to calling . 您只需要這樣做，如果您想要呼叫方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the method. 如果您呼叫方法之前呼叫，則`remoteEP`參數會覆寫指定的預設遠端主機，可傳送作業才。If you do call the method prior to calling , the `remoteEP` parameter will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 您也不需要呼叫方法，因為基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的區域網路位址和連接埠號碼。You are also not required to call the method, because the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果您需要識別指派的本機網路位址和連接埠號碼，您可以使用屬性之後方法成功完成。If you need to identify the assigned local network address and port number, you can use the property after the method successfully completes. 適用於無連線的通訊協定，雖然也適用於使用連線導向的通訊協定。Although intended for connectionless protocols, also works with connection-oriented protocols. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須先透過呼叫建立連接遠端主機方法，或接受連入的連接要求使用方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first establish a remote host connection by calling the method or accept an incoming connection request using the method. 如果您不要建立或接受連接遠端主機將會擲回。If you do not establish or accept a remote host connection, will throw a . 您也可以建立預設遠端主機的無連線的通訊協定，才能呼叫方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在這些情況下，任一將會忽略`remoteEP`參數並只將資料傳送至已連接或預設遠端主機。In either of these cases, will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only send data to the connected or default remote host. 封鎖通訊端，將會封鎖直到傳送要求的位元組數目。Blocking sockets will block until the requested number of bytes are sent. 因為未封鎖完成立即執行，它可能會不傳送所有在單一作業中要求的位元組。Since a nonblocking completes immediately, it might not send all of the bytes requested in a single operation. 負責您的應用程式來追蹤已傳送的位元組數，以及重試此作業，直到應用程式傳送要求的位元組數目。It is your application's responsibility to keep track of the number of bytes sent and to retry the operation until the application sends the requested number of bytes. 另外還有您傳送的資料就會立即出現在網路不保證。There is also no guarantee that the data you send will appear on the network immediately. 若要提高網路效率，基礎的系統可能會延遲傳輸，直到收集大量的傳出的資料。To increase network efficiency, the underlying system may delay transmission until a significant amount of out-going data is collected. 成功完成方法表示基礎的系統有網路資料傳送的緩衝區空間。A successful completion of the method means that the underlying system has had room to buffer your data for a network send. 如果您在封鎖模式中，使用無連接的通訊協定將會封鎖直到傳送資料包。If you are using a connectionless protocol in blocking mode, will block until the datagram is sent. 如果您想要將資料傳送至的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫方法，並設定通訊端選項設定為。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to . 您也必須確定傳送的位元組數目未超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包大小。You must also be sure that the number of bytes sent does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將無連線的資料包傳送至指定的遠端主機。The following code example sends a connectionless datagram to the specified remote host. 大小和傳遞至方法。The size and are passed to the method. param.name: e
param.span: 物件，用於這個非同步通訊端作業。

span.span: The object to use for this asynchronous socket operation.

summary.span: 以非同步方式將資料傳送至特定的遠端主機。

span.span: Sends data asynchronously to a specific remote host.

returns.span: 如果 I/O 作業暫止，則傳回 。

returns.span: 在這個情況下，就不會引發與 參數有關的 事件，而在方法呼叫傳回後會立即檢查做為參數傳遞的 物件，以擷取作業的結果。

span.span: In this case, The event on the parameter will not be raised and the object passed as a parameter may be examined immediately after the method call returns to retrieve the result of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動非同步傳送作業中指定遠端主機屬性`e`參數。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the property of the `e` parameter. 呼叫方法可讓您能夠傳送不同的執行緒中的資料。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 雖然此方法適用於無連線的通訊協定，無連線和連線導向的通訊協定的運作方式。Although this method is intended for connectionless protocols, works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 若要完成的通知，您必須建立實作事件處理常式的回呼方法\ 委派，並將附加的回呼事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 下列的屬性和事件物件，才能成功呼叫這個方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - - - - 呼叫端可能會設定呼叫之前所需的任何使用者狀態物件的屬性方法，如此會在回呼方法中擷取資訊。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回呼需要比單一物件的詳細資訊，就可以建立小型的類別來保存為成員的其他必要的狀態資訊。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，您必須先呼叫， ， ， ， ，或方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the , , , , , or method. 否則將會擲回。Otherwise will throw a . 使用連線導向的通訊協定，當方法將會忽略屬性並傳送資料到中所建立， ， ， ， 或方法。When using a connection-oriented protocol, the method will ignore the property and send data to the established in the , , , , , or method. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，您不需要建立的預設遠端主機， ，或方法之前呼叫。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the , , or method prior to calling . 您只需要這樣做，如果您想要呼叫或方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the or methods. 如果您呼叫， ，或方法呼叫之前，則屬性將會覆寫指定的預設遠端主機，可傳送作業才。If you do call the , , or method prior to calling , the property will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 您也不需要呼叫方法。You are also not required to call the method. 在此情況下，基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的區域網路 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network IP address and port number. 如果您想要選取可用的連接埠基礎的服務提供者，請使用連接埠號碼為零。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果您需要識別已指派的區域網路的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼，您可以使用屬性之後事件收到信號，而且會呼叫相關聯的委派。If you need to identify the assigned local network IP address and port number, you can use the property after the event is signaled and the associated delegates are called. 如果您想要將資料傳送至的廣播位址，您必須先呼叫方法，並設定通訊端選項設為 true。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option for to true. 您也必須確定您的緩衝區的大小未超過基礎的服務提供者的最大的封包大小。You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 若是如此，將不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果您指定的 DontRoute 旗標屬性中，您要將不會路由傳送的資料。If you specify the DontRoute flag in the property, the data you are sending will not be routed. 訊息導向的通訊端，必須小心不能超過訊息大小上限為基礎的傳輸。For message-oriented sockets, care must be taken not to exceed the maximum message size of the underlying transport. 如果緩衝區的大小超過最大的封包大小為基礎的服務提供者，不會傳送資料包並將會擲回。If the size of the buffer exceeds the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider, the datagram is not sent and will throw a . 成功完成方法不會指出已成功傳遞資料。The successful completion of a method does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.

summary.span: 設定通訊端上的 IP 保護層級。

span.span: Set the IP protection level on a socket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓限制 IPv6 或 IP 通訊端接聽指定的範圍，例如地址的相同連結本機或網站本機首碼。The method enables restricting an a IPv6 or IP socket to listen on a specified scope, such as addresses with the same link local or site local prefix. 這個通訊端選項可讓 IPv6 或 IP 的通訊端的存取限制的應用程式。This socket option enables applications to place access restrictions on IPv6 or IP sockets. 這類限制可以讓應用程式在私人 LAN 上執行，簡便又穩當地強化應用程式對外部攻擊的抵禦。Such restrictions enable an application running on a private LAN to simply and robustly harden itself against external attacks. 這個通訊端選項也可用來移除存取限制，如果`level`參數設為。This socket option can also be used to remove access restrictions if the `level` parameter is set to . 這個通訊端選項可放大或縮小接聽通訊端的範圍，根據需要啟用公用和私用使用者的無限制存取，或視需要限制成僅可存取相同的站台。This socket option widens or narrows the scope of a listening socket, enabling unrestricted access from public and private users when appropriate, or restricting access only to the same site, as required. 這個通訊端選項已定義 列舉中所指定的保護層級。This socket option has defined protection levels specified in the enumeration. 方法用來啟用或停用網路位址周遊 (NAT) for執行個體。The method is used to enable or disable Network Address Traversal (NAT) for a instance. 您可以使用 Teredo，6to4 或 ISATAP 通道提供 NAT 周遊。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 當`level`參數設定為，或，這明確停用 NAT 周遊執行個體。When the `level` parameter is set to , or , this explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 當`level`參數設定為，這可能會讓 NAT 周遊根據就地的系統上的防火牆規則。When the `level` parameter is set to , this may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system.

span.span: The parameter cannot be .

exception.span: IP 保護層級不能設定為未指定。

span.span: The IP protection level cannot be set to unspecified.

exception.span: 通訊端的 必須是 或 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選項會決定目前的行為。 options determine the behavior of the current . 設定`optionValue`要`true`若要啟用的選項，或`false`停用選項。Set `optionValue` to `true` to enable the option, or to `false` to disable the option. 選項會依通訊協定支援的層級。 options are grouped by level of protocol support. 以下列出各種可以使用這個多載來設定的選項。Listed below are the various options that can be set using this overload. 這些選項會依適當值。These options are grouped by the appropriate value. 如果您想要設定任何這些選項，請務必使用適當值`optionLevel`參數。If you intend to set any of these options, be sure to use the appropriate value for the `optionLevel` parameter. 若要設定您選擇的選項必須指定`optionName`參數。The option you choose to set must be specified in the `optionName` parameter. 如果您想要取得任何所列的選項的目前值，請使用方法。If you want to get the current value of any of the options listed, use the method. 您可以使用這個多載設定的選項。 options that can be set using this overload. - - - - - - - 您可以使用這個多載設定的選項。 options that can be set using this overload. - - - 您可以使用這個多載設定的選項。 options that can be set using this overload. - - - 您可以使用這個多載設定的選項。 options that can be set using this overload. - 如需有關這些選項的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For more information on these options, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到例外狀況，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟通訊端，並可讓`DontLinger`而`OutOfBandInline`通訊端選項。The following code example opens a socket and enables the `DontLinger` and the `OutOfBandInline` socket options. span.span: One of the values that specifies the operation that will no longer be allowed.

summary.span: 暫停 上的傳送和接收作業。

span.span: Disables sends and receives on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用連線導向，務必呼叫方法關閉之前。When using a connection-oriented , always call the method before closing the . 這可確保所有資料都傳送及它在關閉之前，連接的通訊端上接收。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 呼叫方法來釋放所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源相關聯。Call the method to free all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 請勿嘗試重複使用結尾後面。Do not attempt to reuse the after closing. 下表顯示列舉值，適用於`how`參數。The following table shows the enumeration values that are valid for the `how` parameter. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |傳送Send|停用傳送此。Disable sending on this .| |接收Receive|停用此接收。Disable receiving on this .| |兩種模式Both|停用傳送和接收此。Disable both sending and receiving on this .| 設定`how`要指定後續的呼叫不允許。Setting `how` to specifies that subsequent calls to are not allowed. 如果您使用無連接，並指定會有任何作用。If you are using a connectionless , specifying will have no effect. 設定`how`要指定後續的呼叫不允許。Setting `how` to specifies that subsequent calls to are not allowed. 這會有較低的通訊協定層級上沒有作用。This has no effect on lower protocol layers. 如果您使用連線導向的通訊協定，則連線會終止，如果下列條件存在之後呼叫:If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the connection is terminated if either of the following conditions exist after a call to : - 資料是在等待接收傳入的網路緩衝區中。Data is in the incoming network buffer waiting to be received. - 更多的資料已送達。More data has arrived. 如果您使用無連接的通訊協定，資料包所接受並排入佇列。If you are using a connectionless protocol, datagrams are accepted and queued. 不過，如果沒有緩衝區空間可供其他連入的資料包，都會被捨棄，而且會傳回任何錯誤，寄件者。However, if no buffer space is available for additional incoming datagrams, they will be discarded and no error will be returned to the sender. 使用在無連接不建議使用。Using on a connectionless is not recommended. 設定`how`至停用這兩個傳送和接收上面所述。Setting `how` to disables both sends and receives as described above. > [!NOTE] > 如果您收到呼叫時方法，請使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a when calling the method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用若要停用。The following code example uses to disable the . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 傳送之網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 封包的存留時間 (TTL) 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the Time To Live (TTL) value of Internet Protocol (IP) packets sent by the .

value.span: TTL 值。

span.span: The TTL value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TTL 值會指示之前，路由器會捨棄封包，以及網際網路控制訊息通訊協定 (ICMP) 已超過的 「 TTL 」，將封包可以周遊的路由器數目上限會傳回錯誤訊息寄件者。The TTL value indicates the maximum number of routers the packet can traverse before the router discards the packet and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) "TTL exceeded" error message is returned to the sender. TTL 值可能設定的值，從 0 到 255。The TTL value may be set to a value from 0 to 255. 未設定這個屬性，則通訊端的預設 TTL 值為 32。When this property is not set, the default TTL value for a socket is 32. 如果已建立成功的連線使用通訊端傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 通訊端上設定這個屬性會忽略的 TCP/IP 堆疊。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket is ignored by the TCP/IP stack if a successful connection has been established using the socket. 如果您收到，使用屬性，以取得特定的錯誤碼。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 取得此程式碼之後，請參閱 Windows 通訊端版本 2 API 錯誤碼文件 MSDN library 中的錯誤的詳細描述。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CS/class1.cs#1)]

exception.span: TTL 值不能設定為負數。

span.span: The TTL value can't be set to a negative number.

exception.span: 這個屬性只可為 或 家族中的通訊端設定。

span.span: This property can be set only for sockets in the or families.

exception.span: 嘗試存取通訊端時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

exception.span: 當嘗試將 TTL 設定為大於 255 的值時，也會傳回這個錯誤。

span.span: This error is also returned when an attempt was made to set TTL to a value higher than 255.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`for您想要呼叫。Set this property to `true` for a you intend to call . 架構，否則可能會將完成通訊埠指派給通訊端，則會禁止使用。Otherwise, the Framework may assign a completion port to the socket, which would prohibit the use of .
